we sever gentlefolk general rendezv ill effect us fright deer creatur neighbourhood whose compani much desir necessari subsist
howev negro went everi day hunt call bow arrow scarc ever fail bring us home someth particular found part countri rain fallen time abund wild fowl england duck teal widgeon etc
gees kind never seen frequent kill
also catch great deal fresh fish river want provis
if want anyth salt eat fresh meat littl left use spare negro could tast care eat meat season
the weather began clear rain flood abat sun pass zenith gone southward good way prepar go way
it 12th octob thereabout began set forward easi countri travel well suppli us provis though still without inhabit made despatch travel sometim calcul twenti twenti five mile day halt anywher eleven day march one day except make raft carri us small river
when past river way ran northward found great row hill way
we saw inde countri open right great distanc kept true cours due west will go great way way shun hill
so advanc surpris quit come top one compani two negro got us cri the sea
fell danc jump sign joy
the gunner i surpris morn calcul must yet 1000 mile sea side could expect reach till anoth raini season would upon us man cri the sea gunner angri said mad
but greatest surpris imagin come top hill though high saw noth water either us right hand left vast sea without bound horizon
we went hill full confus thought abl conceiv whereabout must see chart sea yet vast way
it three mile hill came shore water edg sea surpris found water fresh pleasant drink short knew cours take
the sea thought put full stop journey i mean westward lay way
our next question hand turn right hand left soon resolv knew extent consid way sea realli must north therefor went south must much way last
so spent good part day surpris thing consult set forward north
we travel upon shore sea full twenti three day could come resolut end earli one morn one seamen cri land
fals alarm saw plain top hill great distanc side water due west though satisfi us ocean inland sea lake yet saw land northward say end oblig travel eight day near 100 mile farther came end found lake sea end great river ran n n e river done i mention
my friend gunner upon examin said believ mistaken river nile still mind think voyag egypt way resolv upon cross river howev easi river rapid channel broad
it cost us therefor week get materi waft cattl river though store tree yet none consider growth suffici make cano
dure march edg bank met great fatigu therefor travel fewer mile day prodigi number littl river came hill east side empti gulf water pretti high rain newli
in last three day travel met inhabit found live upon littl hill water side littl put food march kill noth four five day fish caught lake plenti found
but make us amend disturb upon shore lake wild beast inconveni kind met ugli venom deform kind snake serpent wet ground near lake sever time pursu us would attack us struck threw anyth would rais hiss loud might heard great way
it hellish ugli deform look voic men would persuad devil know busi satan could peopl
it remark travel 1000 mile without meet peopl heart whole contin africa sure never man set foot sinc son noah spread face whole earth
here also gunner took observ forestaff determin latitud found march thirti three day northward 6 degre 22 minut south latitud
after great difficulti got river came strang wild countri began littl affright us though countri desert dri scald sand pass yet mountain barren infinit full furious wild beast place pass yet
there inde kind coars herbag surfac tree rather shrub
but peopl could see none began great suspens victual kill deer great live chiefli upon fish fowl alway water side seem fail us constern could lay stock proceed upon oblig set scarciti without certainti suppli
we howev remedi patienc kill fowl dri fish much short allow reckon would last us five day resolv ventur ventur without caus apprehens danger travel five day met neither fish fowl four foot beast whose flesh fit eat dread apprehens famish death
on sixth day almost fast may say ate scrap left night lay supperless upon mat heavi heart oblig eighth day kill one poor faith servant buffalo carri baggag
the flesh creatur good spare eat last us three day half spent point kill anoth saw us countri promis better high tree larg river middl
this encourag us quicken march river side though empti stomach faint weak came river good hap meet young deer thing long wish
in word shot three came full stop fill belli never gave flesh time cool ate nay much could stay kill eaten aliv short almost famish
through inhospit countri saw continu lion tiger leopard civet cat abund kind creatur understand saw eleph everi met eleph tooth lie ground lie half buri length time lain
when came shore river found ran norther still rest done differ cours river n e n n e cours lay n w n on farther bank river saw sign inhabit met none first day next day came inhabit countri peopl negro stark nake without shame men women
we made sign friendship found frank civil friend sort peopl
they came negro without suspicion give us reason suspect villaini other done made sign hungri immedi nake women ran fetch us great quantiti root thing like pumpkin made scrupl eat artific show trinket made iron silver none gold
they much judgment choos silver iron show gold found valu much either
for thing brought us provis three live creatur big calv kind neither ever see flesh good brought us twelv smaller creatur like hare welcom us inde great loss provis
we grew intim peopl inde civillest friend peopl met mightili pleas us particular much easier made understand mean met
at last began inquir way point west
they made us understand easili could go way point us might go north west present understood anoth lake way prove true two day saw plain held us till pass equinocti line lie way left hand though great distanc
travel thus northward gunner seem anxious proceed assur us made sensibl map teach came latitud six degre thereabout north line land trend away west length come sea march 1500 mile farther westward countri desir go
i ask navig river might meet run west ocean might perhap carri us stream 1500 mile twice 1500 mile might well enough could get provis
here show map appear river whose stream length kind till came perhap within 200 300 mile shore except rio grand call lay farther northward us least 700 mile knew kind countri might carri us said opinion heat north line even latitud violent countri desol
ill use time would certain put spite could upon us mere reveng
upon consider advis us soon pass lake proceed w s w say littl inclin south time meet great river congo whenc coast call congo littl north angola intend first go
i ask ever coast congo
he said yes never shore
then i ask get thenc coast european ship came see land trend away west 1500 mile must shore travers could doubl west point
he told ten one hear european ship take us often visit coast congo angola trade negro could yet could find provis make way well along sea shore along river till came gold coast said 400 500 mile north congo besid turn coast west 300 shore latitud six seven
i confess i mind argu gone northward ship rio grand trader call river negro niger i knew last would bring us cape de verd sure relief wherea coast go prodigi way still go either sea land certainti way get provis forc present i held tongu tutor opinion
but accord desir came turn southward pass beyond second great lake men began uneasi said way certain go farther home inde far enough alreadi
but march twelv day eight whereof taken round lake four south west order make river congo put anoth full stop enter countri desol fright wild knew think besid appear terribl boundless desert neither wood tree river inhabit even place desol inhabit way
well notwithstand ventur men pass wild place done noth could seem desper undertak
we ventur i say rather saw high mountain way great distanc imagin wherev mountain would spring river river would tree grass tree grass would cattl cattl kind inhabit
at last consequ specul philosophi enter wast great heap root plant bread indian gave us littl flesh salt littl water
we travel two day toward hill still seem far first fifth day got inde travel soft excess hot much equinocti line hard knew whether south north
as conclud hill would spring happen surpris realli fright find first spring came look admir clear beauti salt brine
it terribl disappoint us put us melancholi apprehens first gunner spirit never discourag told us disturb thank salt bait stood much need anyth question find fresh water well salt surgeon step encourag us told us know would show us way make salt water fresh
meantim men without bid seek spring found sever still salt whenc conclud salt rock miner stone mountain perhap might substanc still i wonder witchcraft artist surgeon would make salt water turn fresh i long see experi inde odd one went work much assur tri
he took two larg mat sew togeth made kind bag four feet broad three feet half high foot half thick full
he caus us fill bag dri sand tread close could burst mat
when thus bag full within foot sought earth fill rest still trod hard could
when done made hole upper earth broad crown larg hat someth bigger deep bade negro fill water still shrunk away fill keep full
the bag place first across two piec wood foot ground order skin spread would hold water
in hour sooner water began come drop bottom bag great surpris perfect fresh sweet continu sever hour end water began littl brackish
when told well said turn sand fill
whether way experi fanci whether seen done i rememb
the next day mount top hill prospect inde astonish far eye could look south west northwest noth seen vast howl wilder neither tree river green thing
the surfac found part pass day kind thick moss upon blackish dead colour noth look like food either man beast
had store provis enter ten twenti day upon wilder former fresh water heart good enough ventur though oblig come back went north know might meet neither provis neither place possibl get
we kill wild ferin creatur foot hill except two thing like noth ever saw met noth fit eat
these creatur seem kind buffalo deer inde resembl neither horn great leg like cow fine head neck like deer
we kill also sever time tiger two young lion wolf god thank reduc eat carrion
upon terribl prospect i renew motion turn northward make toward river niger rio grand turn west toward english settlement gold coast everi one readili consent gunner inde best guid though happen mistaken time
he move coast northward might slant away north west cross countri might perhap meet river run rio grand northward gold coast southward direct way shorten labour also countri inhabit fruit probabl find upon shore river alon could furnish provis
this good advic ration taken present busi get dread place
behind us wast alreadi cost us five day march provis five day left go back way
befor us noth horror resolv see ridg hill upon appear fruit seem lead away northward great way keep foot east side go far could meantim look dilig food
accord move next morn time lose great comfort came first morn march good spring fresh water lest scarciti fill bladder bottl carri us
i also observ surgeon made salt water fresh took opportun salt spring made us quantiti three four peck good salt
in third march found unexpect suppli food hill full hare
they kind someth differ england larger swift foot good meat
we shot sever littl tame leopard i told took negro town plunder hunt like dog kill us sever everi day would eat noth unless gave inde circumst oblig
we salt littl dri sun whole carri strang parcel along us
i think almost three hundr know might find either food
we continu cours hill comfort eight nine day found great satisfact countri beyond us began look someth better counten
as west side hill never examin till day three compani rest halt refresh mount hill satisfi curios found could see end north way go tenth day find hill made turn led vast desert left continu cours north countri toler full wood wast tedious long till came
all way found inhabit abund wild raven creatur becam well acquaint realli much mind
we saw lion tiger leopard everi night morn abund seldom came near us let go busi offer come near us made fals fire gun uncharg would walk soon saw flash
we made pretti good shift food way sometim kill hare sometim fowl life i cannot give name except kind partridg anoth like turtl
now began meet eleph great number creatur delight chiefli woodi part countri
this long continu march fatigu us much two men fell sick inde sick thought would die one negro die sudden
our surgeon said apoplexi wonder said could never complain high feed
anoth ill surgeon much ado persuad inde almost forc let blood recov
we halt twelv day sake sick men surgeon persuad three four us let blood time rest thing gave us contribut much continu health tedious march hot climat
in march pitch mat tent everi night comfort us though tree wood shelter us place
we thought strang part countri yet met inhabit princip reason found afterward kept western cours first northern cours gotten much middl countri among desert wherea inhabit princip found among river lake lowland well south west north
what littl rivulet found empti water except pit littl ordinari pool scarc water seen rather show raini month channel realli run water time easi us judg great way go discourag long provis season shelter violent heat inde i thought much greater sun head
our men recov set forward well store provis water suffici bend cours littl westward north travel hope favour stream might bear cano found none till twenti day travel includ eight day rest men weak rest often especi came place proper purpos found cattl fowl
in twenti day march advanc four degre northward besid meridian distanc westward met abund eleph good number eleph teeth scatter woodi ground especi larg
but booti us busi provis good passag countri much purpos found good fat deer kill food hundr ton eleph teeth yet shall present hear came begin passag water thought built larg cano purpos load ivori knew noth river knew anyth danger difficult passag like
at end twenti day travel latitud three degre sixteen minut discov valley distanc us pretti toler stream thought deserv name river ran cours n n w want
as fix thought upon passag water took place make experi bent march direct valley
there small thicket tree way went think harm sudden one negro danger wound arrow shot back slant shoulder
this put us full stop three men two negro spread wood small one found negro bow arrow would escap men discov shot reveng mischief done lost opportun take prison done sent home good usag might brought other us friend manner
go littl farther came five negro hut hous built differ manner seen yet door one lay seven eleph teeth pile wall side hut provid market
here men seven eight women near twenti children
we offer incivil kind gave everi one bit silver beaten thin i observ cut diamond fashion shape bird women overjoy brought us sever sort food understand cake meal made root bake sun ate well
we went littl way farther pitch camp night doubt civil women would produc good effect husband might come home
accord next morn women eleven men five young boy two good big girl came camp
befor came quit us women call aloud made odd scream nois bring us accord came two women show us given point compani behind made sign could easili understand signifi friendship
when men advanc bow arrow laid ground scrape threw sand head turn round three time hand laid upon top head
this seem solemn vow friendship
upon beckon hand come nearer sent boy girl us first seem bring us cake bread green herb eat receiv took boy kiss littl girl men came close us sat ground make sign sit
they said much one anoth could understand could find way make understand us much less whither go want easili made understand want victual whereupon one men cast eye toward rise ground half mile start fright flew place laid bow arrow snatch bow two arrow
when came let fli arrow come back us speed
we see came bow without arrow inquisit fellow say noth us beckon one negro come bid go led back place lay kind deer shot two arrow quit dead brought us
this gift us welcom i assur stock low
these peopl stark nake
the next day came hundr men us women make awkward signal friendship danc show well pleas anyth gave us
how man wood came butcher rude shoot men without make breach first could imagin peopl simpl plain inoffens convers
from henc went bank littl river i mention i found see whole nation negro whether friend us could make judgment yet
the river use us design make cano great travers countri edg five day carpent find stream increas propos pitch tent fall work make cano begun work cut two three tree spent five day labour men wander river brought us word stream rather decreas increas sink
in prospect way march three day full west countri north side extraordinari mountain parch dri seen yet wherea part look due west found pleasant valley run great way two great ridg mountain
the hill look fright entir bare tree grass even white dryness sand valley tree grass creatur fit food inhabit
we pass hut hous saw peopl ran hill soon saw us
at end valley met peopl countri first put us doubt whether go among keep toward hill norther aim princip make way river niger inclin latter pursu cours compass n w
we march thus without interrupt seven day met surpris circumst much desol disconsol time come scarc seem credibl
we much seek convers acquaint nativ countri except found want provis direct way wherea found countri begin popul especi toward left hand south kept distanc norther still stretch toward west
in tract found someth kill eat alway suppli necess though well provid first set thus push avoid peopl countri last came pleasant agreeabl stream water big enough call river run n n w cours desir go
on farthest bank brook perceiv hut negro mani littl low spot ground maiz indian corn grow intim present us inhabit side less barbar met place
as went forward whole caravan bodi negro front cri saw white man
we much surpris first thought mistak fellow ask meant one step point hut side hill i astonish see white man inde stark nake busi near door hut stoop ground someth hand work back toward us see us
i gave notic negro make nois wait till men come show sight might sure i mistaken soon satisfi truth man heard nois start look full us much surpris sure whether fear hope knew
as discov us rest inhabit belong hut crowd togeth look us distanc littl bottom brook ran lie us white man rest told us afterward know well whether stay run away
howev present came thought white men among would much easier make understand meant peac war found other tie piec white rag end stick sent two negro bank water carri pole high could present understood two men white man came shore side
howev white man spoke portugues could understand noth one anoth sign men made white man understand white men said white man laugh
howev short men came back told us good friend hour four men two negro black princ went river side white man came
they half quarter hour negro came run told white man ingles call upon i ran back eager enough may sure found said englishman upon embrac passion tear run face
the first surpris see us came one may conceiv brief account gave us afterward unhappi circumst unexpect deliver perhap never happen man world million one odd ever could reliev noth adventur never heard read could suit case unless heaven miracl never expect
he appear gentleman ordinari bred fellow seaman labour man show behaviour first moment convers spite disadvantag miser circumst
he middl age man thirti seven thirti eight though beard grown exceed long hair head face strang cover middl back breast white skin fine though discolour place blister cover brown blackish substanc scurfi scali hard effect scorch heat sun stark nake told us
he exceed transport meet could scarc enter discours us day could get away us littl saw walk alon show extravag token ungovern joy even afterward never without tear eye sever day upon least word spoken us circumst deliver
we found behaviour courteous endear i ever saw man whatev evid token manner well bred person appear thing said peopl exceed taken
he scholar mathematician could speak portugues inde spoke latin surgeon french anoth men italian third
he leisur thought ask us whenc came whither go would alway answer sure wherev go came heaven sent purpos save wretch condit ever man reduc
our men pitch camp bank littl river opposit began inquir store provis propos suppli
when found store small said would talk nativ provis enough said courteous good natur part inhabit part countri might suppos live safe among
the first thing gentleman us inde greatest consequ us first perfect inform us properest cours us steer second put us way furnish effectu provis third complet interpret peacemak nativ began numer us fierc polit peopl met easili terrifi arm ignor give provis
this i say negro nativ soon came among poor peopl live among much acquaint thing distanc 300 mile coast found eleph teeth upon hill north took carri sixti seventi mile south trade negro usual met gave bead glass shell cowri english dutch trader furnish
we began familiar new acquaint first though made sorri figur cloth neither shoe stock glove hat among us shirt yet well could cloth first surgeon scissor razor shave cut hair hat i say store suppli make cap piec leopard skin artifici
as shoe stock gone long without care even buskin foot glove wore i describ
as curious hear whole stori travel exceed delight relat less know pleas account circumst histori come strang place alon condit found
this account would inde subject agreeabl histori would long divert mani strang extraordinari incid cannot room launch long digress sum histori he factor english guinea compani sierra leon settlement taken french plunder effect well entrust compani
whether compani justic restor circumst employ quit servic employ call separ trader afterward employ also trade account pass unwarili one compani settlement either betray hand nativ somehow surpris
howev kill found mean escap time fled anoth nation nativ enemi entertain friend live time like quarter compani fled sever time chang landlord sometim carri forc sometim hurri fear circumst alter varieti deserv histori till last wander beyond possibl return
as nake cloth nake arm defenc neither gun sword staff instrument war guard attack wild beast countri full
we ask came entir abandon concern safeti
he answer often wish death life worth defend entir merci negro much confid see weapon hurt
as wild beast much concern scarc ever went hut negro king men went arm bow arrow lanc would kill raven creatur lion well other seldom came abroad day negro wander anywher night alway build hut make fire door guard enough
we inquir next toward get seasid
he told us one hundr twenti english leagu coast almost european settlement factori call gold coast mani differ nation negro way ten one either fought continu starv want provis two way go compani go often contriv make escap
the one travel full west though farther go yet full peopl peopl find would much civil us much easier fight way possibl get rio grand go stream cano
we told way resolv met told us prodigi desert go prodigi wood go came togeth least twenti day march us travel hard could
we ask hors countri ass even bullock buffalo make use journey show three left
he said countri afford anyth kind
he told us great wood immens number eleph upon desert great multitud lion lynx tiger leopard c
wood desert negro went get eleph teeth never fail find great number
we inquir still particular way gold coast river eas us carriag told negro fight us much concern afraid starv victual among would share therefor would ventur show us way would ventur go told would live die togeth man us stir
he told us heart resolv would ventur might assur would take fate us would endeavour guid us way meet friend savag would use us well perhap stand us other less tractabl word resolv go full south gold coast
the next morn came us met council may call began talk serious us sinc come long journey view end troubl oblig offer carri us night revolv mind might make amend sorrow first said let know one richest part world though realli otherwis desol disconsol wilder
what mine gold immens store gold mountain may contain whenc river come shore water run know may imagin must inconceiv rich see much wash stream water wash side land quantiti suffic trader european world send thither
we ask far went see ship trade upon coast
he told us negro coast search river length 150 200 mile would month two three time alway come home suffici reward say never come thus far yet hereabout much gold
upon told us believ might gotten hundr pound weight gold sinc came thither employ look work knew long sinc despair ever deliv miseri entir omit
for advantag said richer i i ton gold dust lay wallow
the rich said would give one moment felic reliev present exig
nay say see would buy cloth cover drop drink save perish
it valu say sever peopl among hut would weigh gold glass bead cockl shell give hand gold dust hand cowri
n b these littl shell children call blackamoor teeth
when said thus pull piec earthen pot bake hard sun
here say dirt countri i would i could got great deal show us i believ two three pound weight gold dust kind colour gotten alreadi
after look told us smile deliver well life therefor would valu us came countri desir would accept among us time repent pick
i spoke interpret comrad name thank speak portugues i desir defer accept kind next morn i tell would talk part morn part time
when gone i found wonder affect discours generos temper well magnific present anoth place extraordinari
upon whole detain circumst agre see one number relief carri dismal condit equal relief us guid rest countri interpret nativ director manag savag enrich wealth countri therefor would put gold among common stock everi one give much would make much singl
in next confer acquaint adventur golden river share got everi man larger stock share therefor instead take resolv everi one add littl
he appear glad met good success would take grain us till last press hard told us would take thus came get would much first make even would go equal adventur thus agre
he told us thought would unprofit adventur set forward got stock provis make journey north edg desert told us whenc negro might bring everi one larg eleph tooth would get assist certain length carriag might convey cano coast would yield great profit
i object account design get gold dust negro knew would faith us would get much search river gold us lug great tooth hundr fifti pound weight hundr mile would insuffer labour hard journey would certain kill
he acquiesc justic answer fain would us gone see woodi part hill edg desert might see eleph teeth lay scatter told stori seen said said
we stay twelv day time nativ oblig us brought us fruit pompion root like carrot though quit anoth tast unpleas neither guinea fowl whose name know
in short brought us plenti live well gave littl thing cutler made whole bag full
on thirteenth day set forward take new gentleman us
at part negro king sent two savag present dri flesh i rememb gave three silver bird cutler help i assur present king
we travel south littl west found first river 2000 mile march whose water run south rest run north west
we follow river bigger good larg brook england till began increas water
everi found englishman went privat water tri land length day march upon river came run us hand full sand say look
upon look found good deal gold lay spangl among sand river
now say i think may begin work divid negro coupl set work search wash sand ooz bottom water deep
in first day quarter men togeth gather pound two ounc gold thereabout found quantiti increas farther went follow three day till anoth small rivulet join first search stream found gold pitch camp angl river join divert i may call wash gold sand river get
here stay thirteen day time mani pleasant adventur savag long mention home tell men made someth free women new guid made peac us one men price seven fine bit silver artific cut shape lion fish bird punch hole hang inestim treasur must gone war peopl
all busi wash gold dust river negro like ingeni cutler hammer cut grown dexter use form manner imag
he cut eleph tiger civet cat ostrich eagl crane fowl fish inde whatev pleas thin plate hammer gold silver iron almost gone

he much taken would quiet till given almost hand gold dust call i suppos might weigh three quarter pound piec gold eleph made might weight pistol rather less
our artist honest though labour art brought gold put common stock inde manner reason least covet new guid told us strong enough defend time enough stay none us hast might time get togeth quantiti gold pleas even hundr pound weight man thought fit therefor
the propos howev good profit part suit none us desir get home rich tire excess fatigu year continu wander among desert wild beast
howev tongu new acquaint kind charm use argument much power persuas resist

here found countri barren enough yet direct plenti food savag round us upon give toy i often mention brought us whatev found maiz indian wheat negro women plant sow seed garden immedi new provid order negro plant grew present water often crop less three
as soon settl camp fix fell old trade fish gold river mention english gentleman well knew direct search scarc ever lost labour

the journal travel long enter upon

inde wonder come us saw attend 200 negro soon undeceiv us made throw burden heap entranc camp

and talk go forward coast put end journey guid laugh us
nay go say raini season begin next month stir
this found inde reason resolv furnish provis might oblig go abroad much rain spread one way anoth far care ventur get provis negro kill us deer cure well could sun salt
by time raini month set could scarc two month look hut
but river swell land flood scarc knew littl brook rivulet great navig river
this good opportun convey water upon raft eleph teeth great pile alway gave savag reward labour women would bring us teeth upon everi opportun sometim great tooth carri two quantiti increas two twenti ton teeth
as soon weather prove fair told us would press us stay sinc care whether got gold inde first men ever met life said gold enough might truli said lay feet would stoop take
but sinc made us promis would break press us make stay thought ought tell us time land flood greatest quantiti gold found stay one month see thousand savag spread whole countri wash gold sand european ship would come coast rage flood alway work great deal
this forcibl well argu appear face prevail upon told would stay though true eager gone yet evid prospect much advantag could well resist great mistaken suggest desir increas store gold resolv make utmost use advantag hand would stay long gold anoth year

at first littl encourag began doubt plain reason water fulli fallen river reduc usual channel day fulli requit found much gold first bigger lump one men wash sand piec gold big small nut weigh estim small weight almost ounc half
this success made us extrem dilig littl month altogeth gotten near sixti pound weight gold told us found abund savag men women children hunt everi river brook even dri land hill gold could noth like compar done

i neither friend relat acquaint england though nativ countri i consequ person trust i counsel secur save fall ill compani trust keeper public hous rotherhith great part money hastili squander away rest great sum i got much pain hazard gone littl two year
so scene life may said begun theft end luxuri sad set wors come home
about year i began see bottom stock time think adventur spoiler i call began let know money declin respect would ebb i noth expect i might command forc money short would go inch spent favour
this shock much i conceiv abhorr ingratitud wore i met regret wast glorious sum money i brought england
i next ship evil hour sure voyag cadiz ship call cours voyag coast spain oblig put groyn strong southwest wind
here i fell compani master mischief among one forward rest began intim confid call one anoth brother communic circumst one anoth
his name harri
this fellow came one morn ask i would go shore i agre got captain leav boat went togeth
when togeth ask i mind adventur might make amend past misfortun
i told yes heart i care i went noth lose one leav behind
he ask i would swear secret i agre propos i would nevertheless never betray
i readili bound upon solemn imprec curs devil us could invent
he told brave fellow ship point anoth english ship rode harbour concert men resolv mutini next morn run away ship could get strength enough among ship compani might
i like propos well got eight us join told us soon friend begun work master ship readi like
this plot i without least hesit either villaini fact difficulti perform came immedi wick conspiraci went among us could bring part perfect
accord day appoint correspond ship whose name wilmot began work seiz captain mate offic secur ship gave signal us
we eleven ship conspiraci could get could trust leav ship took boat went join
have thus left ship i entertain great deal joy captain wilmot new gang well prepar manner rogueri bold desper i mean without least check conscienc i enter upon anyth i might much less apprehens might consequ i say thus embark crew last brought consort
i i hint origin thief pirat even inclin element never undertook anyth life particular satisfact
captain wilmot call thus possess ship manner heard may easili conclud noth stay port wait either attempt might made shore chang might happen among men
on contrari weigh anchor tide stood sea steer away canari
our ship twenti two gun abl carri thirti besid fit merchant ship furnish either ammunit small arm suffici design occas might case fight
so put cadiz say came anchor bay captain one call young captain kidd gunner land men could best trust among comrad harri made second mate made lieuten
some bale english good propos carri shore us sale comrad complet fellow busi propos better way town told us short would buy powder bullet small arm anyth els want word paid came board english good
this much best way accord captain went shore made bargain found turn came away two hour time bring butt wine five cask brandi went board
the next morn two barco longo came us deepli laden five spaniard board traffic
our captain sold good pennyworth deliv us sixteen barrel powder twelv small rundlet fine powder small arm sixti musket twelv fuse offic seventeen ton cannon ball fifteen barrel musket bullet sword twenti good pair pistol
besid brought thirteen butt wine becom gentlemen scorn drink ship beer also sixteen puncheon brandi twelv barrel raisin twenti chest lemon paid english good captain receiv six hundr piec eight money
they would come would stay longer
from henc sail canari thenc onward west indi commit depred upon spaniard provis took prize none great valu i remain long time taken spanish sloop coast carthagena friend made motion desir captain wilmot put us sloop proport arm ammunit let us tri could

but reason meddl littl english vessel could first ship forc sure resist second found english ship less booti taken spaniard general money board best knew

but part i buri silenc present

we one merri fellow quaker whose name william walter took sloop bound pennsylvania barbado
he surgeon call doctor employ sloop surgeon go barbado get berth sailor call
howev surgeon chest board made go us take implement
he comic fellow inde man good solid sens excel surgeon worth good humour pleasant convers bold stout brave fellow among us
i found william i thought avers go along us yet resolv might appar taken away forc purpos come
friend say thou sayest i must go thee power resist thee i would i desir thou wilt oblig master sloop i board certifi hand i taken away forc
and said much satisfact face i could understand
ay ay say i whether i make men give certif i take along us keep till
so i drew certif wherein i wrote taken away main forc prison pirat ship carri away chest instrument first bound hand behind forc boat sign master men
accord i fell swear call men tie hand behind put boat carri away
when i board i call
now friend say i i brought away forc true i opinion i brought away much imagin
come say i use man us shall good usag among us
so i unbound hand first order thing belong restor captain gave dram
thou hast dealt friend say i plain thee whether i came will thee
i shall make use thee i thou knowest busi meddl thou art fight
no say captain may meddl littl share money
those thing use furnish surgeon chest say william smile i shall moder
in short william agreeabl companion better us part taken sure hang sure escap knew well enough
but short spright fellow fitter captain us
i shall often occas speak rest stori
our cruis long sea began well known england franc spain account made public adventur mani stori told murder peopl cold blood tie back back throw sea one half howev true though done fit speak
the consequ howev sever english men war sent west indi particular instruct cruis bay mexico gulf florida among bahama island possibl attack us
we ignor thing expect long stay part world first certain account hondura vessel come jamaica told us two english men war come direct jamaica thither quest us
we inde embay could made least shift got come direct us happen somebodi inform bay campeachi went direct thither free much windward could make attempt upon us though known
we took advantag stood away carthagena thenc great difficulti beat distanc shore st martha till came dutch island curacoa thenc island tobago rendezv desert uninhabit island time made use retreat
here captain brigantin die captain harri time lieuten took command brigantin
here came resolut go away coast brazil thenc cape good hope east indi captain harri i said captain brigantin alleg ship small long voyag captain wilmot would consent would take hazard anoth cruis would follow us first ship could take
so appoint rendezv madagascar done recommend place plenti provis
accord went away us evil hour instead take ship follow us taken i heard afterward english man war laid iron die mere grief anger came england
his lieuten i heard afterward execut england pirat end man first brought unhappi trade
we part tobago three day bend cours coast brazil sea twenti four hour separ terribl storm held three day littl abat intermiss
in junctur captain wilmot happen unluckili board ship great mortif lost sight ship never saw till came madagascar cast away
in short tempest lost fore topmast forc put back isl tobago shelter repair damag brought us near destruct
we sooner shore busi look piec timber topmast perceiv stand shore english man war thirti six gun
it great surpris us inde disabl much great good fortun lay pretti snug close among high rock man war see us stood upon cruis
so observ way went night leav work resolv stand sea steer contrari way observ went found desir success saw
we gotten old mizzen topmast board made us juri fore topmast present stood away isl trinidad though spaniard shore yet land men boat cut good piec fir make us new topmast got fit effectu also got cattl eke provis call council war among resolv quit sea
the first thing attempt get fresh water learnt lay portugues fleet bay all saint bound lisbon readi sail wait fair wind
this made us lie wish see put sea accord without convoy attack avoid
it sprung fresh gale even s w w fair portug fleet weather pleasant agreeabl heard signal given unmoor run island si haul mainsail foresail brail lower topsail upon cap clew might lie snug could expect come next morn saw whole fleet come accord satisfact
it long saw sail immedi gave chase prove excel sailer stand sea saw plain trust heel say sail
howev clean ship gain upon though slowli day us certain come grew dark apac case knew lose sight
our merri quaker perceiv us crowd still dark wherein could see way went came dryli
friend singleton say dost thee know
say i yes chase yon ship
and dost thou know
say grave still
nay true say i cannot sure
yes friend say i think may sure run away chase
i afraid add thou art turn quaker hast resolv use hand power art coward art fli thi enemi
what mean
say i i think i swore
what sneer
you alway one dri rub anoth give us
nay say plain enough ship stood sea due east purpos lose us thou mayest sure busi lie way coast africa latitud far south congo angola
but soon dark would lose sight tack stand away west brazil coast bay thou knowest go run away
i great hope friend say dri gibe creatur thou wilt turn quaker i see thou art fight
veri well william say i i shall make excel pirat
howev william right i apprehend meant immedi captain wilmot lay sick cabin overhear us understood well i call william right best way chang cours stand away bay ten one snap morn
accord went ship got larboard tack board set top gallant sail crowd bay all saint came anchor earli morn gunshot fort furl sail rope yarn might haul home sheet without go loos lower main fore yard look lain good
in two hour afterward saw game stand bay sail could make came innoc mouth lay still till saw almost within gunshot foremost gear stretch fore aft first ran yard haul home topsail sheet rope yarn furl give way sail set minut time slip cabl came upon could
they surpris made littl resist struck first broadsid
we consid william came
hark thee friend say thou hast made fine piec work hast thou borrow thi neighbour ship thi neighbour door never ask leav
now dost thou think men war port
thou hast given alarm suffici thou wilt upon thi back night depend upon ask thee wherefor thou didst
truli william said i aught i know may true shall next
say thou hast two thing either go take rest els get thee gone come take thee i see hoist topmast yon great ship order put sea immedi long come talk thee wilt thou say ask thee thou borrowedst ship without leav
as william said
we could see glass hurri man fit sloop larg man war plain would soon us
but loss found ship taken laden noth consider purpos except cocoa sugar twenti barrel flour rest cargo hide took thought fit turn among rest ammunit great shot small arm turn
we also took cabl three anchor purpos sail
she enough left carri port
have done stood upon brazil coast southward till came mouth river janeiro
but two day wind blow hard s e s s e oblig come anchor littl island wait wind
in time portugues seem given notic land governor pirat upon coast came view port saw two men war ride without bar whereof one found get sail possibl speed slip cabl purpos speak us forward prepar follow
in less hour stood fair us sail could make
had night come william word made good would certain ask us question found foremost ship gain upon us especi upon one tack pli away windward dark lose sight resolv chang cours stand away direct sea doubt lose night
whether portugues command guess would i know morn daylight appear instead lost found chase us leagu astern great good fortun could see one two
howev one great ship carri six forti gun admir sailer appear outsail us ship excel sailer i said
when i found i easili saw remedi must engag knew could expect quarter scoundrel portugues nation i origin avers i let captain wilmot know
the captain sick jump cabin would led upon deck weak see
well say fight
our men good heart see captain brisk lain ill calentur ten eleven day gave doubl courag went hand work make clear ship readi
william quaker come kind smile
friend say yon ship follow us
whi say i fight us may sure
well say come us dost thou think
yes said i see
whi friend say dri wretch dost thou run still thou seest overtak thee
will better us overtaken farther
much one say i would us
say let us give poor man troubl need must let us stay hear say us
he talk us powder ball said i veri well say countri languag must talk must
els shall understand us
veri well william say i understand
and captain ill call william right say good leagu farther
so give word command haul main sail shorten sail
