it half hour came us time luf might keep wind oblig run lee design got upon quarter edg receiv fire five six gun
by time may sure hand quarter clap helm hard weather let go lee brace maintop sail laid back ship fell athwart portugues ship haws immedi pour broadsid rake fore aft kill great mani men
the portugues could see utmost confus awar design ship fresh way ran bowsprit fore part main shroud could easili get clear us lay lock manner
the enemi could bring five six gun besid small arm bear upon us play whole broadsid upon
in middl heat fight i busi upon quarter deck captain call never stir us what devil friend william yonder
say captain busi upon deck
i step forward friend william two three stout fellow lash ship bowsprit fast mainmast fear get away us everi pull bottl pocket gave men dram encourag
the shot flew ear thick may suppos action portugues give due fought brisk believ first sure game trust superior william compos perfect tranquil danger bowl punch busi secur matter ship forti six gun run away ship eight twenti
this work hot hold long men behav brave gunner gallant man shout pour shot rate portugues began slacken fire dismount sever gun fire forecastl rake i said fore aft
present come william
friend say calm dost thou mean
whi dost thou visit thi neighbour ship door open thee
i understood immedi gun torn hull beat two port hole one bulk head steerag split piec could retir close quarter i gave word immedi board
our second lieuten thirti men enter instant forecastl follow boatswain cut piec twenti five men found upon deck throw grenado steerag enter also upon portugues cri quarter present master ship contrari inde expect would compound would sheer lay athwart haws
the surpris joy hear portugues cri quarter see ancient struck great captain i said reduc weak high fever gave new life
natur conquer distemp fever abat night two three day sensibl better strength began come abl give order effectu everyth materi ten day entir well ship
in meantim i took possess portugues man war captain wilmot made rather i made captain present
about thirti seamen took servic us french genoes set rest shore next day littl island coast brazil except wound men condit remov bound keep board occas afterward dispos cape request set shore
captain wilmot soon ship taken prison stow stand river janeiro doubt meet man war abl find us lost compani comrad would certain return might surpris ship taken carri portugues colour men
but friend william gave us better counsel came friend say i understand captain sail back rio janeiro hope meet ship chase thee yesterday
is true dost thou intend
whi yes say i william pray
nay say thou mayest thou wilt
well i know william said i captain man rule reason say
whi say william grave i ask thi busi busi peopl thou hast thee
is get money
yes william honest way
and wouldest thou say rather money without fight fight without money
i mean wouldest thou choic suppos left thee
o william say i first two sure
whi say great gain hast thou made prize thou hast taken though cost live thirteen thi men besid hurt
it true thou hast got ship prison thou wouldest twice booti merchant ship one quarter fight dost thou know either forc number men may ship loss thou mayest suffer gain shall thee thou take
i think inde thou mayest much better let alon
whi william true said i i go tell captain opinion bring word say
accord i went captain told william reason captain mind busi inde fight could help main affair money blow could
so adventur laid asid stood along shore south river de la plata expect purchas thereabout especi eye upon spanish ship bueno ayr general rich silver one prize would done busi
we pli latitud south near month noth offer began consult next come resolut yet
inde design alway cape de bona speranza east indi
i heard flame stori captain averi fine thing done indi doubl doubl even ten thousand fold take great prize bay bengal took ladi said great mogul daughter great quantiti jewel stori told us took mogul ship foolish sailor call laden diamond
i would fain friend william advic whither go alway put quak quibbl
in short care direct us neither whether made piec conscienc whether care ventur come afterward i know conclud last without
we howev pretti long resolv hanker rio de la plata long time
at last spi sail windward sail i believ seen part world great
it want give chase stood direct toward us well steer could make even accid weather anyth els wind chop anywher must gone
i leav man sailor understand anyth ship judg figur ship made first saw could imagin matter
her maintop mast come board six foot cap fell forward head topgal mast hang fore shroud stay time parrel mizzen topsail yard accid give way mizzen topsail brace stand part fast main topsail shroud brought mizzen topsail yard spread part quarter deck like
in manner came upon us wind quarter
in word figur whole ship made confound men understood sea ever seen
she boat neither colour
when came near fire gun bring
she took notic us came
we fire one
at length came within pistol shot one anoth nobodi answer appear began think ship gone ashor somewher distress men forsaken high tide float sea
come nearer ran alongsid close could hear nois within see motion sever peopl port
upon man two boat full men well arm order board minut near could enter one fore chain one side amidship side
as soon came ship side surpris multitud black sailor appear upon deck short terrifi men much boat enter men waist stood durst board men enter boat find first boat thought beaten see ship full men jump back boat put know matter
upon prepar pour broadsid upon friend william set us right seem guess sooner come ship came friend say i opinion thou art wrong matter thi men wrong also conduct
i tell thee thou shalt take ship without make use thing call gun
how william
said i whi said thou mayest take thi helm thou seest keep steerag thou seest condit board thi ship upon lee quarter enter ship
i persuad thou wilt take without fight mischief befallen ship know noth
in word smooth sea littl wind i took advic laid aboard
immedi men enter ship found larg ship upward 600 negro men women boy girl one christian white man board
i struck horror sight immedi i conclud part case black devil got loos murder white men thrown sea i sooner told mind men thought enrag i much ado keep men cut piec
but william mani persuas prevail upon tell noth negro condit would could negro realli highest injustic done sold slave without consent law natur dictat ought kill would wil murder
this prevail cool first heat knock twenti thirti rest ran deck first place believ fanci first master come
it unaccount difficulti next could make understand one word said could understand one word said
we endeavour sign ask whenc came could make noth
we point great cabin round hous cook room face ask white men board gone could understand meant
on hand point boat ship ask question well could said thousand thing express great earnest could understand word know meant sign
we knew well must taken board ship slave must european peopl
we could easili see ship dutch built ship much alter built upon suppos franc found two three french book board afterward found cloth linen lace old shoe sever thing
we found among provis barrel irish beef newfoundland fish sever evid christian board saw remain
we found sword gun pistol weapon kind except cutlass negro hid lay
we ask becom small arm point place belong ship hung
one negro understood present beckon come upon deck take fuze i never let go hand time master ship i say offer take hold made proper motion throw sea i understood i afterward thrown small arm powder shot sword c
sea believ i suppos thing would kill though men gone
after understood made question ship crew surpris desper rogu gone way thrown overboard also
we look ship see could find blood thought perceiv sever place heat sun melt pitch tar upon deck made imposs us discern exact except round hous plain saw much blood
we found scuttl open suppos captain made retreat great cabin cabin made escap round hous
but confirm us happen upon inquiri found seven eight negro much wound two three shot whereof one leg broken lay miser condit flesh mortifi friend william said two day would die
william dexter surgeon show cure though surgeon board ship less five call bred surgeon besid two three pretend assist though gave opinion negro leg must cut life could save without mortif touch marrow bone tendon mortifi could never use leg cure william
accord went work leg desir might surgeon assist appoint two ablest help look thought fit
william went work way pretend find fault first
howev proceed search everi part leg suspect mortif touch word cut great deal mortifi flesh poor fellow felt pain
william proceed till brought vessel cut bleed man cri reduc splinter bone call help set call bound laid man rest found much easier
at first open surgeon began triumph mortif seem spread long red streak blood appear wound upward middl man thigh surgeon told man would die hour
i went look found william surpris i ask long thought poor fellow could live look grave said as long thou canst i apprehens life said i would cure i could without make crippl
i found upon oper leg mix someth give poor creatur repel i thought spread contagion abat prevent feverish temper might happen blood went work open leg two place wound cut great deal mortifi flesh seem occas bandag press part much withal blood time common
well friend william conquer clear spread mortif red streak went flesh began heal matter run day man spirit began recov puls beat regular fever gather strength daili word perfect sound man ten week kept amongst us made abl seaman
but return ship never could come certain inform till negro kept board taught speak english gave account afterward maim man particular
we inquir sign motion could imagin becom peopl yet could get noth
our lieuten tortur make confess william oppos vehement heard consider came
friend say i make request thee put poor wretch torment
whi william said i
you see give account becom white men
nay say william say i suppos given thee full account everi particular
say i pray wiser jabber
nay say william may thi fault aught i know thou wilt punish poor men cannot speak english perhap never heard word english
now i may well suppos given thee larg account everyth thou seest earnest long talk thee thou canst understand languag thine help
at best thou dost suppos told thee whole truth stori contrari i suppos wilt thou decid question whether thou art right whether i right
besid say thee thou askest question upon tortur time understand question thou dost know whether say ay
it compliment moder say i convinc reason yet much ado keep second lieuten murder make tell
what told
he understand one word would persuad negro must need understand ask whether ship boat like becom
but remedi wait till made peopl understand english adjourn stori till time
the case thus taken board ship could never understand never knew english name give coast nation belong ship knew one tongu anoth thus far negro i examin whose leg william cure told us speak languag spoke portugues spoke probabl must french dutch
then told us white men use barbar beat unmerci one negro men wife two negro children one daughter sixteen year old white man abus negro man wife afterward daughter said made negro men mad woman husband great rage white man provok threaten kill night negro
that gunner ship secur gun room one men haul long boat close stern put arm ammunit could come got boat afterward took captain great cabin
when thus embark resolv lay ship aboard tri recov
that board ship desper manner kill first stood way negro time loos gotten arm though understood noth powder bullet gun yet men could never master
howev lay ship bow got men left cook room maintain notwithstand negro could small arm kill thirti forti negro last forc leav
they could give account whereabout whether near coast africa far long ship fell hand general great ago call could learn within two three day set sail coast
they told us kill thirti white men knock head crow handspik thing could get one strong negro kill three iron crow shot twice bodi afterward shot head captain door round hous split open crow suppos occas great quantiti blood saw round hous door
the negro told us threw powder shot could find sea would thrown great gun sea could lift
be ask came sail condit answer they understand know sail much know sail made ship go understand meant
when ask whither go said know believ go home countri
i ask particular thought first came
he said terribl fright believ white men gone away boat come great ship two boat expect would kill
this account got taught speak english understand name use thing belong ship occas speak observ fellow innoc dissembl relat agre particular alway stori confirm much truth said
have taken ship next difficulti negro
the portugues brazil would bought us glad purchas show enemi known pirat durst go ashor anywher thereabout treat planter rais whole countri upon us thing men war port sure attack forc land sea
nor could think better success went northward plantat
one determin carri away bueno ayr sell spaniard realli mani make use carri round south sea remedi left far way abl subsist long voyag
at last old never fail friend william help us often done dead lift
his propos go master ship twenti men could best trust attempt trade privat upon coast brazil planter princip port would admit
we agre appoint go away toward rio de la plata thought go wait port st pedro spaniard call lie mouth river call rio grand spaniard small fort peopl believ nobodi
here took station cruis see could meet ship go come bueno ayr rio de la plata met noth worth notic
howev employ thing necessari go sea fill water cask got fish present use spare much possibl ship store
william meantim went away north made land cape de st thoma betwixt isl de tuberon found mean trade planter negro well women men good price william spoke portugues pretti well told fair stori enough ship scarciti provis driven great way way inde say
this plausibl tale easili believ observ manner negro sail happen voyag everi word true
by method true one anoth william pass i mean honest fellow assist one planter sent neighbour planter manag trade among got quick market less five week william sold negro last sold ship ship twenti men two negro boy left sloop one planter use send board
with sloop captain william call came away found us port st pedro latitud 32 degre 30 minut south
noth surpris us see sloop come along coast carri portugues colour come direct us assur discov ship
we fire gun upon nearer approach bring anchor immedi fire five gun way salut spread english ancient
then began guess friend william wonder mean sloop wherea sent away ship near 300 ton soon let us whole histori manag great deal reason well satisfi
as soon brought sloop anchor came aboard ship gave us account began trade help portugues planter live near seasid went shore went first hous could see ask man hous sell hog pretend first stood upon coast take fresh water buy provis man sold seven fat hog
this oblig planter next morn sent board great luggag boat cow two sheep chest sweetmeat sugar great bag tobacco invit captain william shore grew one kind anoth began talk trade negro william pretend servic consent sell thirti negro privat use plantat gave
this remov brought william intimaci first planter also friend desir negro also one anoth bought mani till one overgrown planter took 100 negro william left share anoth planter planter chaffer william ship give exchang clean larg well built sloop near sixti
william 300 moidor gold besid sloop payment ship money store sloop full could hold provis especi bread pork sixti hog aliv among rest william got eighti barrel good gunpowd much purpos provis french ship took also
this agreeabl account us especi saw william receiv gold coin weight spanish silver 60 000 piec eight besid new sloop vast quantiti provis
we glad sloop particular began consult whether best turn great portugues ship stick first ship sloop see scarc men enough three biggest ship thought big busi
howev anoth disput decid brought first conclus
the first disput whither go
my comrad i call say captain took portugues man war go south sea coast west side america could fail make sever good prize upon spaniard occas requir might come home south sea east indi go round globe other done us
but head lay anoth way
i east indi entertain notion ever sinc went thither could fail make good work might safe retreat good beef victual ship among old friend nativ zanzibar coast mozambiqu island st lawrenc
i say thought lay way i read mani lectur advantag would certain make strength prize would take gulf mocha red sea coast malabar bay bengal i amaz
with argument i prevail resolv steer away s e cape good hope consequ resolut conclud keep sloop sail three doubt i assur find men make number want might cast pleas
we could less make friend william captain sloop good manag brought us
he told us though much good manner would command frigat would give share guinea ship came honest would keep us compani victual command long forc took away
we understood gave sloop upon condit go us entir command
howev william easi inde afterward want sloop cruis purchas right thorough pace pirat i pain william i could without privi counsellor companion upon occas i put scotsman bold enterpris gallant fellow name gordon made carri twelv gun four peterero though
we sail away cape good hope begin octob 1706 pass sight cape 12th novemb follow met great deal bad weather
we saw sever merchant ship road well english dutch whether outward bound homeward could tell would think fit come anchor know might might attempt us knew
howev want fresh water sent two boat belong portugues man war portugues seamen negro water place take water meantim hung portugues ancient sea lay night
they knew seem pass anyth realli
our boat return third time loaden five clock next morn thought suffici water stood away eastward men return last time wind blow easi gale west perceiv boat grey morn sail crowd come us afraid gone
we soon found english long boat pretti full men
we could imagin mean boat thought could great harm let come board appear came inquir would give full account busi take along us see want men much anyth
but save us labour doubt dispos seem portugues seamen went water silent water place thought would
but case short captain i forbear name present particular reason captain east india merchant ship bound afterward china found reason sever men handl rough st helena insomuch threaten among leav ship first opportun long wish opportun
some men seem met boat water place inquir one anoth upon account whether portugues seamen falter account made suspect upon cruis whether told plain english spoke english enough understood soon ever men carri news board ship lay eastward english go upon
when came ship side i command hail usual manner know busi
they answer englishmen desir come board
we told might lay ship board order let one man enter ship till captain knew busi come without arm
they said ay heart
we present found busi desir go us arm desir would send men board boat would deliv us done
the fellow came told use captain starv men use like dog rest men knew admit satisfi two third would leav ship
we found fellow hearti resolut jolli brisk sailor i told i would noth without admir captain ship i sent pinnac board captain wilmot desir come board
but indispos leeward excus come left boat return captain wilmot call speak trumpet men might hear well i thus call name i hear honest fellow pray tell welcom make bowl punch
as men heard well i need tell captain said soon trumpet done set huzza show us hearti come us bound us stronger oblig still came madagascar captain wilmot consent ship compani order men much money given stock due pay ship left allow twenti piec eight man
it 28th novemb bad weather came anchor road st augustin bay south west end old acquaint isl madagascar
we lay awhil traffick nativ good beef though weather hot could promis salt keep i show way practis salt first saltpetr cure dri sun made eat agreeabl though wholesom men agre way cook viz
boil pud brewi c
particular way would salt fat meat rusti dri away eaten
this howev could help made amend feed heartili fresh beef excel good fat everi way tender well relish england thought much better us tast england long time
have time remain began consid place busi i view particular way told station look purchas two part island particular proper purpos first bay east side island thenc island mauritius usual way ship came malabar coast coast coromandel fort st georg c
use take wait ought take station
but hand resolv fall upon european trader general ship forc well man blow must look i anoth prospect i promis would yield equal profit perhap greater without hazard difficulti former gulf mocha red sea
i told trade great ship rich strait babelmandel narrow doubt might cruis let noth slip hand sea open red sea along coast arabia persian gulf malabar side indi
i told i observ i sail round island former progress northernmost point island sever good harbour road ship nativ even civil tractabl possibl often ill treat european sailor south east side might alway sure retreat driven put necess either enemi weather
they easili convinc reason scheme captain wilmot i call admir though first mind go lie island mauritius wait european merchant ship road coromandel bay bengal mind
it true strong enough attack english east india ship greatest forc though said carri fifti gun i repres sure blow blood took done load equal valu us room dispos merchandis circumst stood rather taken one outward bound east india ship readi cash board
all thing consid brought admir mind entir take water fresh provis lay near cape st mari south west corner island weigh stood away south afterward s s e round island six day sail got wake island steer away north till came port dauphin north east latitud 13
howev afterward found occas remov station shall hear present
we noth go shore acquaint littl nativ take fresh water fresh provis sea
we found peopl easi deal cattl extrem island quantiti cattl
howev present resolv appoint place rendezv go look
this latter end april
accord put sea cruis away northward arabian coast
it long run wind general blow trade s s s e may septemb good weather twenti day made island socotra lie south arabian coast e s e mouth gulf mocha red sea
here took water stood upon arabian shore
we cruis three day thereabout i spi sail gave chase came never poor prize chase pirat look booti found noth poor half nake turk go pilgrimag mecca tomb prophet mahomet
the junk carri one thing worth take away littl rice coffe poor wretch subsist let go inde knew
the even chase anoth junk two mast someth better plight look former
when came board found upon errand peopl better fashion got plunder turkish store diamond ear drop five six person fine persian carpet made saffra lie upon money let go also
we continu eleven day longer saw noth fish boat twelfth day cruis spi ship inde i thought first english ship appear european freight voyag goa coast malabar red sea rich
we chase took without fight though gun board mani
we found man portugues seamen direct five merchant turk hire coast malabar portug merchant laden pepper saltpetr spice rest load chiefli calico wrought silk rich
we took carri socotra realli knew reason good littl valu us
after day found mean let one turkish merchant know would ransom ship would take sum money let go
he told i would let one go shore money would adjust valu cargo 30 000 ducat
upon agreement allow sloop carri shore dofar arabia rich merchant laid money came sloop payment money fair honest let go
some day took arabian junk go gulf persia mocha good quantiti pearl board
we gut pearl seem belong merchant mocha let go noth els worth take
we continu cruis till began find provis grow low captain wilmot admir told us time think go back rendezv rest men said littl weari beat three month togeth meet littl noth compar great expect i loth part red sea cheap rate press tarri littl longer instanc
i great mortifi news could longer withstand importun men return madagascar
howev wind continu still blow s s e s oblig stand away toward coast africa cape guardafui wind variabl shore open sea
here chop upon booti look made amend wait hour made land spi larg vessel sail along shore southward
the ship bengal belong great mogul countri board dutch pilot whose name i rememb right vandergest sever european seamen whereof three english
she condit resist us
the rest seamen indian mogul subject malabar other
there five indian merchant board armenian
it seem mocha spice silk diamond pearl calico c
good countri afford littl board money piec eight way want three english seamen came along us dutch pilot would done two armenian merchant entreat us take pilot none men knew guid ship request refus made promis use ill will go us
we got near 200 000 piec eight vessel said true jew goa intend embark 200 000 piec eight good fortun spring ill fortun hinder fell sick mocha could readi travel save money
there none take prize sloop captain wilmot ship prove leaki went away rendezv us arriv middl decemb like port left great cross shore direct written plate lead fix us come great bay mangahelli found good harbour learn piec news kept us great admir took
but stori interrupt come
between mangahelli anoth point call cape st sebastian came shore night european ship whether stress weather want pilot i know ship strand could got
we lay cove harbour i said rendezv appoint yet shore seen direct admir left us
our friend william i said noth great great mind one day go shore importun let littl troop go safeti might see countri
i mightili mani reason particular i told knew nativ savag treacher i desir would go gone much farther i believ i downright refus command go
but order persuad let go told would give account reason importun
he told last night dream forcibl made impress upon mind could quiet till made propos go i refus thought dream signific dream end
his dream said went shore thirti men cockswain said one upon island found mine gold enrich
but main thing said morn dream cockswain came told dream went shore island madagascar men came told would show get prize would make rich
these two thing put togeth began weigh littl though i never inclin give heed dream william importun turn effectu i alway put great deal stress upon judgment short i gave leav go i charg go far sea coast forc seasid upon occas might perhap see fetch boat
they went away earli morn one thirti men number well arm stout fellow travel day night made us signal well top hill agre make great fire
next day march hill side inclin toward seasid promis saw pleasant valley river middl littl farther seem big enough bear small ship march apac toward river surpris nois piec go sound could far
they listen long could hear went river side fine fresh stream widen apac kept bank till almost open widen good larg creek harbour five mile sea still surpris march forward plain saw mouth harbour creek wreck ship
the tide call net appear much water made downward found grow bigger bigger tide soon eb found lay dri upon sand appear wreck consider vessel larger could expect countri
after time william take glass look near surpris hear musket shot whistl immedi heard gun saw smoke side upon men immedi fire three musket discov possibl
upon nois gun abund men came run shore among tree men could easili perceiv european though knew nation howev men halloo loud could got long pole set hung white shirt upon flag truce
they side saw help glass quick men see boat launch shore thought anoth creek seem immedi came row creek men carri also white flag token truce
it easi describ surpris joy satisfact appear side see white men englishmen place remot must came know one anoth find countrymen comrad ship captain wilmot admir command whose compani lost storm tobago make agreement rendezv madagascar
they seem got intellig us came south part island rove far gulf bengal met captain averi join took sever rich prize amongst rest one ship great mogul daughter immens treasur money jewel thenc came coast coromandel afterward malabar gulf persia also took
and told us also heard captain averi lost ship also far
when thus acquaint one anoth fortun poor overjoy men hast go back communic joy comrad leav men rest went back william earnest see two went back came littl camp live
there hundr sixti men got gun shore ammunit good deal powder spoil howev rais fair platform mount twelv piec cannon upon suffici defenc side sea end platform made launch littl yard hard work build anoth littl ship i may call go sea put stop work upon news
when men went hut surpris inde see vast stock wealth got gold silver jewel howev told us trifl captain averi wherev gone
it five day wait men news inde i gave lost surpris five day wait see ship boat come row toward us along shore
what make i could tell least better satisfi men told heard halloo saw wave cap us
in littl time came quit us i saw friend william stand boat make sign us came board i saw fifteen one thirti men i ask becom fellow
oh say william well dream fulli made good cockswain
this made impati know case stood told us whole stori inde surpris us
the next day weigh stood away souther join captain wilmot ship mangahelli found i said littl chagrin stay pacifi afterward tell histori william dream consequ
in meantim camp comrad near mangahelli admir i friend william men resolv take sloop go see fetch good bag baggag board ship accord found camp fortif batteri gun erect treasur men william relat stay took men sloop brought away us
it time knew becom captain averi month direct men lost ship sent sloop cruis along shore find possibl week cruis men found particular lost ship well men lost everi way bad condit
it ten day sloop return captain averi whole forc i rememb captain averi ever join compani togeth stood thus we two ship sloop 320 men much man ought great portugues ship requir near 400 men man complet
as lost found comrad complement men 180 thereabout captain averi 300 men whereof ten carpent taken aboard prize taken word forc averi madagascar year 1699 thereabout amount three ship lost heard never 1200 men
it month crew got togeth averi unship agre bring compani portugues man war sloop give captain averi spanish frigat tackl furnitur gun ammunit crew full wealth agre give us 40 000 piec eight
it next consid cours take
captain averi give due propos build littl citi establish shore good fortif work proper defend wealth enough could increas degre pleas content retir bid defianc world
but i soon convinc place would secur us pretend carri cruis trade nation europ inde part world would engag root us resolv live retir plant countri privat men give trade pirat inde might plant settl pleas
but i told best way would treat nativ buy tract land farther countri seat upon navig river boat might go pleasur ship endang us thus plant high ground cattl cow goat countri also full sure might live well men world i own i thought good retreat will leav
captain averi howev made posit discoveri intent seem declin notion go countri plant contrari appar captain wilmot opinion might maintain shore yet carri cruis trade upon resolv
but i afterward understood fifti men went countri settl inland place coloni
whether still i cannot tell mani left aliv opinion still consider increas i hear got women among though mani seem five dutch women three four littl girl taken dutch ship afterward took go mocha three women marri men went live new plantat
but i speak hearsay
as lay time i found peopl mightili divid notion go way till last i began forese would part compani perhap men enough keep togeth man great ship i took captain wilmot asid began talk soon perceiv inclin stay madagascar got vast wealth share secret design
i argu imposs hazard would run either fall hand thiev murder red sea would never let treasur pass hand fall hand english dutch french would certain hang pirat
i gave account voyag i made place contin africa journey travel foot
in short noth could persuad would go red sea sloop children israel pass sea dri shod land would travel grand cairo land eighti mile thenc said could ship way alexandria part world
i repres hazard inde imposs pass mocha jiddah without attack offer forc plunder went get leav explain reason much effectu though last would hearken none men would go
they told would go anywher serv run certain destruct without possibl avoid probabl answer end
the captain took i said quit wrong pretend resent gave buccan word upon i gave return i advis advantag understand fault mine i forbid go i offer persuad men go though appar destruct
howev warm head easili cool
the captain eager quit compani part crew went captain averi sort peopl take treasur way fair agre share gain whether less whether absent present
our men mutter littl i pacifi well i could told easi us get much mind hit captain wilmot set us good exampl rule agreement share profit end
i took occas put head part design rang eastern sea see could make rich mr averi true gotten prodigi deal money though one half said europ
our men pleas forward enterpris temper assur would go one whole globe wherev i would carri captain wilmot would noth
this came ear put great rage threaten i came shore would cut throat
i inform privat took notic i took care go unprovid seldom walk good compani
howev last captain wilmot i met talk matter serious i offer sloop go pleas satisfi i offer take sloop leav great ship declin desir i would leav six carpent i ship i need help men finish sloop begun came thither men lost ship
this i consent readili lent sever hand use littl time built stout brigantin abl carri fourteen gun 200 men
what measur took captain averi manag afterward long stori meddl busi stori still upon hand
we lay sever simpl disput almost five month latter end march i set sail great ship forti four gun 400 men sloop carri eighti men
we steer malabar coast gulf persia first intend east monsoon blow yet strong kept african coast wind variabl till pass line made cape bassa latitud four degre ten minut thenc monsoon begin chang n e n n e led away wind larg maldiv famous ledg island well
here lay wait purchas saw three larg english east india ship go bengal fort st georg homeward england rather bombay surat till trade set
we brought hoist english ancient pendant lay intend attack
they could tell make us good though saw colour i believ first thought us french came nearer us let soon see hoist black flag two cross dagger main top mast head let see expect
we soon found effect first spread ancient made us line would fight us wind shore fair enough brought board us saw forc found cruiser anoth kind stood away us sail could make
if come given unexpect welcom mind follow let go reason i mention
but though let pass design let other go easi price
it next morn saw sail stand round cape comorin steer thought cours us
we knew first shore larboard quarter offer chase might put port creek escap us prevent sent sloop get land
as soon saw haul keep land aboard sloop stood toward made right ashor canva could spread
the sloop howev came engag found vessel ten gun portugues built dutch trader hand man dutchmen bound gulf persia batavia fetch spice good thenc
the sloop men took rummag came
she european good good round sum money pearl though go gulf pearl pearl came us gulf share
this rich ship good consider valu besid money pearl
we long consult men give ship let pursu voyag java would alarm dutch factori far strongest indi make passag way impractic wherea resolv visit part world way will pass great bay bengal hope great deal purchas therefor behov us waylaid came knew must pass
while consult great cabin men debat mast seem major pickl poor dutchmen among herring word throw sea
poor william quaker great concern come direct talk
hark thee say william wilt thou dutchmen thou hast board
thou wilt let go i suppos say
whi say i william would advis let go
no say william i cannot say fit thee let go say go voyag batavia thi turn dutch batavia knowledg thi sea
well say i i know remedi throw overboard
you know william say i dutchman swim like fish peopl opinion well i at time i resolv done want hear william would say
he grave repli if men ship mind i never believ thou wilt mind thyself i heard thee protest cruelti case
well william say i true shall
whi say william way murder
i persuad thou canst earnest
no inde william say i i earnest shall go java ceylon certain
but say william men done thee injuri thou hast taken great treasur canst thou pretend hurt
nay william say i talk i pretenc enough pretenc prevent hurt necessari piec law self preserv name main thing i know prevent prate
while william i talk poor dutchmen open condemn die may call whole ship compani warm men upon grew clamor heard william swore die william oppos drown along
but i resolv put end cruel project i found time take upon littl bloodi humour might grow strong i call dutchmen talk littl
first i ask will go us
two offer present rest fourteen declin
well said i would go
they desir go ceylon
no i told i could allow go dutch factori told plain reason could deni
i let know also cruel bloodi measur men i resolv save possibl therefor i told i would set shore english factori bay bengal put board english ship i met i past strait sunda malacca come back i told i would run ventur dutch power batavia i would news come
it came next consider ship long resolv two way either set fire run shore chose last
so set foresail tack cat head lash helm littl starboard answer head sail set ago neither cat dog two hour saw run right ashor upon coast littl beyond cape comorin away went round ceylon coast coromandel
we sail along sight shore near see ship road fort st david fort st georg factori along shore well along coast golconda carri english ancient came near dutch factori dutch colour pass english factori
we met littl purchas upon coast except two small vessel golconda bound across bay bale calico muslin wrought silk fifteen bale romal bottom bay go whose account knew acheen port coast malacca
we inquir place particular let vessel go none indian board
in bottom bay met great junk belong mogul court great mani peopl passeng suppos seem bound river hoogh gang came sumatra
this prize worth take inde got much gold besid good meddl pepper particular like put end cruis almost men said rich enough desir go back madagascar
but i thing head still i came talk set friend william talk put golden hope head soon prevail let us go
my next design leav danger strait malacca singapor sunda could expect great booti might light european ship must fight though abl fight want courag even desper yet rich resolv richer took maxim sure wealth sought without fight occas put necess fight would

we took sixteen ton nutmeg provis small arm great gun let ship go thenc sail direct banda island island sure get nutmeg thought fit

burn tree stop entranc cave

upon fetch two barrel powder ship place insid hollow cave far durst go carri fill mouth cave tree stood ram suffici hard leav pipe touch hole gave fire stood distanc see way would oper sudden found forc powder burst way among bush side littl hill i mention

first saw mouth cave powder torn open loos earth fallen noth shape could discern saw becom garrison indian given us troubl arm leg head lay half buri rubbish mine say loos earth fell short miser havoc made good reason believ one insid could escap rather
we full satisfact indian short lose voyag two men kill one quit crippl five wound spent two barrel powder eleven day time get understand make indian mine keep garrison hollow tree wit bought dear price came away taken fresh water got fresh provis
we consid get back madagascar
we much latitud cape good hope long run neither sure meet fair wind land way knew think
william last resort case plain us
friend say captain wilmot occas hast thou run ventur starv mere pleasur say thou hast nobodi
there great mani place nearer home thou mayest say thing less expens
i see occas thou hast keep thus far south longer till sure west end java sumatra thou mayest stand away north toward ceylon coast coromandel madra thou mayest get fresh water fresh provis part like may hold well enough store alreadi
this wholesom advic slight stood away west keep latitud 31 35 good weather fair wind ten day sail time reckon clear isl might run away north fall ceylon least go great deep bay bengal
but reckon great deal stood due north fifteen sixteen degre met land starboard bow three leagu distanc came anchor half leagu man boat see sort countri
we found good one fresh water easi come cattl could see inhabit shi search far lest make anoth journey last let rambl alon chose rather take could find wild mango plant sever kind knew name
we made stay put sea n w n littl wind fortnight made land stand shore surpris find south shore java come anchor saw boat carri dutch colour sail along shore
we solicit speak nation left indiffer peopl went shore see dutchmen see busi get provis inde time short us
we resolv go shore boat conveni place could find look proper harbour bring ship leav fate whether meet friend enemi resolv howev stay consider time least long enough express sent across island batavia ship come round thenc attack us
we found accord desir good harbour rode seven fathom water well defend weather whatev might happen got fresh provis good hog cow might lay littl store kill sixteen cow pickl barrel flesh well could suppos latitud eight degre line
we five day fill cask water last boat come herb root unmoor fore topsail loos sail spi larg ship northward bear direct upon us
we knew might conclud worst made possibl hast get anchor get sail might readi see say us great concern one ship notion attack three four togeth
by time got anchor boat stow ship within leagu us thought bore engag us spread black flag ancient poop bloodi flag top mast head made clear ship stretch away westward get wind
they seem quit mistaken us expect noth enemi pirat sea doubt one ship seem confus found mistak immedi haul upon wind tack stood edg shore toward easternmost part island
upon tack stood sail could two hour came almost within gunshot
though crowd sail could lay remedi engag us soon saw inequ forc
we fire gun bring man boat sent us flag truce
we sent back boat answer captain noth strike bring ship anchor stern come board us know demand howev sinc yet put us troubl forc saw abl assur captain return safeti men suppli us thing demand ship plunder
they went back messag time board struck made us begin think refus fire shot minut perceiv boat put soon boat put ship struck came anchor direct
when captain came board demand account cargo chiefli bale good bengal bantam
we told present want provis need end voyag would send boat shore procur us six twenti head black cattl threescor hog quantiti brandi arrack three hundr bushel rice would let go free
as rice gave us six hundr bushel actual board togeth parcel ship upon freight
also gave us thirti middl cask good arrack beef pork none
howev went shore men bought eleven bullock fifti hog pickl occas upon suppli provis shore dismiss ship
we lay sever day could furnish provis agre men fanci dutchmen contriv destruct honest could furnish black cattl found imposs suppli mani
so came told us ingenu unless could stay longer could get oxen cow eleven oblig satisfi take valu thing rather stay longer
on side punctual observ condit agre would let men much go board suffer men come board us men gone board nobodi could answer behaviour shore enemi countri
we victual voyag matter purchas went merrili coast ceylon intend touch get fresh water provis noth materi offer part voyag met contrari wind month passag
we put upon south coast island desir littl dutch could dutch lord countri commerc sea coast sever fort particular cinnamon trade island
we took fresh water provis much troubl lay store beef hog got java yet gone good deal
we littl skirmish shore peopl island men littl familiar home ladi countri home inde degre men good stomach way would scarc touch
i could never fulli get men true one anoth wicked i understood main barbar thing done like paid dear men resent last degre gather number sixteen men anoth boat come nick time rescu first men eleven fetch main forc cut inhabit less two three hundr arm dart
as seventeen men wound danger
but fright hurt everi one gave dead men believ lanc poison
but william comfort two surgeon opinion told men foolish enough would die william cheer went work cure one rather die drink arrack punch wound excess drink throw fever
we enough ceylon though peopl go ashor sixti seventi men togeth reveng william persuad reput great among men well us command could influenc us
they mighti warm upon reveng would go shore destroy five hundr
well say william suppos better
whi say one speak rest shall satisfact
well better
say william
they could say noth
then say william i mistak busi money i desir know conquer kill two three thousand poor creatur money pray get
they poor nake wretch shall gain
but say william perhap may chanc lose half score compani probabl may
pray gain
account give captain lost men
in short william argu effectu convinc mere murder men right right take away destroy innoc men act otherwis law natur dictat would much murder meet man highway kill mere sake cold blood regard whether done wrong us
these reason prevail last content go away leav found
in first skirmish kill sixti seventi men wound great mani noth peopl got noth loss one man life wound sixteen
but anoth accid brought us necess busi peopl inde like put end live adventur among three day put sea place skirmish attack violent storm wind south rather hurrican wind point southward blew desper furious manner s e s w one minut one point instant turn
after blew furi s w s s w w put us back great way eastward ledg rock found great open rock land endeavour come anchor found ground fit anchor lose anchor noth rock
we stood open held four leagu
the storm continu found dread foul shore knew cours take
we look narrowli river creek bay might run come anchor found none great
at length saw great headland lie far south sea length short saw plain wind held could weather ran much lee point could came anchor twelv fathom water
but wind veer night blow exceed hard anchor came home ship drove till rudder struck ground ship gone half length farther lost everi one us
but sheet anchor held heav cabl get clear ground struck upon
it cabl rode night toward morn thought wind abat littl well us spite sheet anchor us found ship fast aground morn great surpris amaz
when tide though water eb away ship lay almost dri upon bank hard sand never i suppos ship upon
the peopl countri came great number look us gaze know gape us great sight wonder surpris knew
i reason believ upon sight immedi sent account ship condit next day appear great man whether king i know abund men long javelin hand long half pike came water edg drew good order view
they stood near hour without make motion came near twenti man carri white flag
they came forward water high waist sea go high wind abat blew shore
the man made long orat us could see gestur sometim heard voic knew one word said
william alway use us i believ save live
the case the fellow i might call speech done gave three great scream i know els say lower white flag three time made three motion us arm come
i acknowledg i man boat go william would mean allow
he told ought trust nobodi barbarian govern might sure murder christian fare much better knew custom malabar betray peopl could get hand peopl regard safeti go mean
i oppos great told i thought use alway right i thought i run needless risk one els i thought nation world even savag peopl held flag peac kept offer peac made signal sacr i gave sever exampl histori african travel i gone begin work i could think peopl wors
and besid i told case seem must fall somebodi hand better fall hand friend treati forc submiss nay though inde treacher design therefor i parley
well friend say william grave thou wilt go i cannot help i shall desir take last leav thee part depend upon thou wilt never see us
whether ship may come better last i cannot resolv thee i answer give live idl cool blood thou art go least preserv long die last like men like fool trepan wile barbarian
william spoke much warmth yet much assur fate i began think littl risk i go run
i mind murder yet i could life faint heart thing
upon i ask knowledg place ever
he said no
then i ask heard read anyth peopl island way treat christian fallen hand told heard one would tell stori afterward
his name said knox command east india ship driven shore upon island ceylon though could say place whereabout beguil barbarian entic come shore invit time surround eighteen twenti men never suffer return kept prison murder could tell carri away countri
i time ask give full stori knox much less hear tell usual case one begin littl touch i turn short
whi friend william said i would us
you see condit us someth must done immedi
whi say william i tell thee thou shalt first caus white flag hang us man longboat pinnac mani men well stow handl arm let go thou shalt see
if i miscarri thou mayest safe i also tell thee i miscarri shall fault thou shalt learn wit folli
i knew repli first paus i said william william i lost i danger i desir may fall i therefor let us keep ship fare alik take fate togeth
no say william danger method i propos thou shalt go thou thinkest fit
if thou pleasest follow measur i shall resolv depend upon though go ship man us go nearer within call talk
thou seest boat come us say i rather desir thou wouldst take advic manag ship i shall give signal boat let us concert matter togeth go
well i found william measur head laid beforehand loss i told captain voyag would us order i would see observ tittl
upon conclus debat order four twenti men long boat twelv men pinnac sea pretti smooth went well arm
also order gun great ship side lay next shore load musket ball old nail stub like piec old iron lead anyth came hand prepar fire soon ever saw lower white flag hoist red one pinnac
with measur fix us went toward shore william pinnac twelv men long boat come four twenti stout resolut fellow well arm
they row near shore might speak one anoth carri white flag offer parley
the brute show courteous find could understand fetch old dutchman prison mani year set speak us
the sum substanc speech king countri sent general know busi
william stood stern pinnac told european languag voic might easili know condit ship aground upon sand would also tell busi ship distress william desir know came multitud arm weapon came war us
he answer might good reason come shore countri alarm appear ship stranger upon coast vessel full men gun weapon king sent part militari men case invas upon countri might readi defend whatsoev might occas
but say men distress king order general also give assist invit shore receiv possibl courtesi
say william quick upon befor i give thee answer i desir thee tell thou art thi speech thou art european
he answer present dutchman
that i know well say william thi speech art thou nativ dutchman holland nativ countri learn dutch convers among holland know settl upon island
no say old man i nativ delft provinc holland europ
well say william immedi art thou christian heathen call renegado
i say christian
and went short dialogu follow william
thou art dutchman christian thou sayest pray art thou freeman servant

but art thou volunt prison
inde i prison first liberti volunt
that say first prison thou hast liberti serv art thou liberti thou mayest go away thou pleasest thine countrymen
no i say countrymen live great way north east part island go without king express licens
well dost thou get licens go away
i never ask
and i suppos thou didst thou knowest thou couldst obtain
i cannot say much ask question
whi reason good thou art christian prison canst thou consent made instrument barbarian betray us hand thi countrymen fellow christian
is barbar thing thee
how i go betray
do i give account king invit come shore order treat courteous assist

he promis mouth great general

how i answer
how i tell intend

d you slight much know may

wilt thou give leav say william talk plain thee upon thi present circumst thi futur prospect live
wilt thou promis thi word take noth ill
with heart said i william i alway found advic good design well laid counsel lucki us therefor say i promis i take ill
but demand say william thou dost like i go propos thee thou shalt promis make public among men
i william say i upon word swore heartili
whi say william i one thing articl thee thou wilt consent thou dost approv thyself thou wilt yet consent i shall put much practic relat new comrad doctor noth thi detriment loss
in anyth say i william leav i i cannot part upon term whatev
well say william i design part thee unless thi
but assur point i tell mind freeli
so i promis everyth desir solemnest manner possibl serious frank withal william made scrupl open mind
whi first place say william shall i ask thee thou dost think thou thi men rich enough realli gotten much wealth togeth whatsoev way gotten question know
whi truli william said i thou art pretti right i think pretti good luck
well say william i would ask whether thou hast gotten enough thou hast thought leav trade peopl leav trade satisfi get rich enough nobodi trade sake trade much less men rob sake thiev
well william say i i perceiv thou art drive
i warrant say i begin hanker home
whi truli say william thou hast said i hope thou dost
it natur men abroad desir come home last especi grown rich thou ownest thyself rich enough rich know
well william said i think laid preliminari first home i noth say i got money enough would natur think go home
but explain mean home i shall differ
whi man i home habit i never lifetim i kind chariti school boy i desir go anywher rich poor i nowher go
whi say william look littl confus art thou englishman
yes say i i think see i speak english i came england child never sinc i man i cheat impos upon use ill i care i never see
whi hast thou relat friend
say acquaint none thou hast kind remain respect
not i william said i i court geat mogul
nor kind countri thou wast born
say william
not i island madagascar much neither fortun island thou knowest william said i william quit stun discours held peac i said go william hast thou say farther
i hear project head say i come let
nay say william thou hast put silenc i say overthrown project come noth gone
well william said i let hear though i aim look way though i relat friend acquaint england yet i say i like rove cruis life well never give
let hear thou canst propos anyth beyond
certain friend say william grave someth beyond lift hand seem much affect i thought i saw tear stand eye i harden wretch move thing laugh
say i mean death i warrant
that beyond trade
whi come come provid
ay say william true would better thing thought came
thought
say i signifi think
to think death die alway think one life long die
it time enough think come
you easili believ i well qualifi pirat could talk thus
but let leav upon record remark harden rogu like conscienc gave pang i never felt i said what signifi think
told i one day think word sad heart time reflect yet come i went
say william serious i must tell thee friend i sorri hear thee talk
they never think die often die without think
i carri jest way farther said prithe talk die know shall ever die
began laugh
i need answer thee say william place reprov thee art command i would rather thou wouldst talk otherwis death coars thing
say anyth william said i i take kind
i began much move discours
say william tear run face it men live never die mani die know live
but death i meant i said someth thought beyond way live
whi william said i
it repent say
whi say i ever know pirat repent
at startl littl return at gallow i known one i hope thou wilt second
he spoke affection appear concern
well william say i i thank i senseless thing perhap i make seem

my propos say william thi good well
we may put end kind life repent i think fairest occas offer time ever ever inde happen
look william say i let propos put end present way live first case us i talk afterward
i insens said i may think
but let us get hellish condit first
nay say william thou art right must never talk repent continu pirat
well say i william i meant must reform well sorri done i notion repent mean inde best i know littl matter natur thing seem tell first step take break wretch cours i begin heart
i could see counten william thorough pleas offer tear eye quit differ passion swallow joy could speak
come william say i thou showest plain enough thou hast honest mean dost thou think practic us put end unhappi way live get
yes say i think practic whether thee depend upon thyself
well say i i give word i command along time i first took board shall command hour everyth direct i
wilt thou leav
dost thou say freeli
yes william said i freeli i perform faith
whi say william scheme we mouth gulf persia sold much cargo surat money enough send away bassorah sloop laden china good board make anoth good cargo i warrant thee i find mean among english dutch merchant lodg quantiti good money also merchant abl recours
i told i thought need go far bassorah might run gombroon ormuz pretend busi
no say i cannot act freedom compani factori i may laid hold pretenc interlop
well said i may go ormuz i loth part long go bottom persian gulf
he return i leav see caus
we taken larg sum money surat near hundr thousand pound money command board great ship still great deal
i order public keep money board buy quantiti ammunit could get furnish us new exploit meantim i resolv get quantiti gold jewel i board great ship place i might carri without notic soon came back accord william direct i left go voyag i went board great ship
we wait less two month william return inde i began uneasi william sometim think abandon might use artific engag men compli gone away togeth three day return i upon point resolv go away madagascar give old surgeon mimick quaker pass master sloop surat
at length william came back inexpress joy brought great mani necessari thing particular brought sixti barrel powder iron shot thirti ton lead also brought great deal provis word william gave public account voyag hear whoever happen upon quarter deck
after done william move might go i would go name sever thing board could sell particular told us oblig leav sever thing caravan come engag come back good
this i want
the men eager go particular told might load sloop back rice provis i seem backward go old surgeon stood persuad go mani argument press particular i go would order sever men might drop away perhap betray rest think safe sloop go i go urg offer go
upon consider i seem persuad go compani seem better satisfi i consent accord took powder lead iron sloop great ship thing ship use put bale spice cask frail clove seven ton good among bale i convey privat treasur i assur small valu away i went
at go i call council offic ship consid place wait long appoint ship stay eight twenti day littl island arabian side gulf sloop come time sail anoth island west place wait fifteen day sloop come conclud accid must happen rendezv madagascar
be thus resolv left ship william i surgeon never intend see
we steer direct gulf bassorah balsara
this citi balsara lie distanc place sloop lay river safe ill acquaint ordinari pilot went shore villag merchant live popul sake small vessel ride
here stay trade three four day land bale spice inde whole cargo consider valu chose rather go immedi balsara till project laid put execut
after bought sever good prepar buy sever other boat shore twelv men william surgeon one fourth man singl contriv send turk dusk even letter boatswain give fellow charg run possibl speed stood small distanc observ event
the content letter thus written old doctor boatswain thoma we betray
for god sake make boat get board lost
the captain william quaker georg reformad seiz carri away i escap hid cannot stir i i dead man
as soon board cut slip make sail live
r s we stood undiscov dusk even saw turk deliv letter three minut saw men hurri boat put sooner board took hint suppos next morn sight never heard tale tide sinc
we good place good circumst pass merchant persia
it materi record mass ill gotten wealth got togeth purpos tell i began sensibl crime get manner i done i littl satisfact possess i told william i expect keep much desir i said one day walk field near town bassorah i depend upon would case hear present
we perfect secur bassorah fright away rogu comrad noth consid convert treasur thing proper make us look like merchant like freeboot realli
we happen opportun upon dutchman travel bengal agra capit citi great mogul thenc come coast malabar land got ship somehow gulf found design go great river bagdad babylon caravan aleppo scanderoon
as william spoke dutch agreeabl insinu behaviour soon got acquaint dutchman discov circumst one anoth found consider effect trade long countri make homeward countri servant one armenian taught speak dutch someth mind travel europ dutch sailor pick fanci
this dutchman glad acquaint soon found direct thought europ also found encumb good let know noth money readili offer us assist dispos mani place would put advic rest
while william i consult first resolv would never talk serious measur open field sure nobodi could hear everi even sun began declin air moder walk sometim way sometim consult affair
i observ new cloth persian manner long vest silk gown robe english crimson cloth fine handsom let beard grow persian manner pass persian merchant view though way could understand speak one word languag persia inde english dutch latter i understood littl
howev dutchman suppli us resolv keep retir could though sever english merchant upon place yet never acquaint one exchang word mean prevent inquiri us give intellig us news land happen come easi us know possibl enough comrad fell bad hand mani accid could
it stay near two month i grew thought circumst danger neither inde entir conceal unsuspect i realli began thought world ever i
william struck deep unthink temper hint someth beyond present time time enjoy time account approach work remain gentler labour past viz
repent high time think i say thought engross hour word i grew sad
as wealth i immens great like dirt feet i valu peac possess great concern leav
william perceiv thought troubl mind heavi oppress time one even one cool walk i began leav effect
william wise wari man inde prudenti conduct long time owe advic method preserv effect even lay upon tell measur take make homeward secur wealth i took short
whi william say i dost thou think shall ever abl reach europ cargo us
ay say william without doubt well merchant long public known quantiti valu cargo consist
whi william say i smile think god long tell must give account him i say think he righteous judg he let us escap thus plunder may call mani innoc peopl nay i might say nation call us account get europ pretend enjoy
william appear struck surpris question made answer great i repeat question ad expect
after littl paus say william thou hast start weighti question i make posit answer i state thus first true consid justic god reason expect protect ordinari way provid common road human affair may hope merci still upon repent know good he may us act rather
but hark ye william say i natur repent hint includ reform never reform repent
whi never reform
say william
becaus said i cannot restor taken away rapin spoil
it true say william never never come knowledg owner
but must done wealth said i effect plunder rapin
if keep continu robber thiev quit cannot justic cannot restor right owner
nay say william answer short
to quit throw away claim divest right wherea ought keep care togeth resolut right abl know opportun provid may put hand justic least injur
so ought least leav him go
as without doubt present busi go place safeti may wait his
this resolut william satisfi inde truth said time solid good william thus quiet mind i think verili i alarm reason i expect vengeanc heaven upon ill gotten wealth i run away devil good i noth belong i right keep certain danger destroy
howev william settl mind prudent step i conclud i ought howev proceed place safeti leav event god almighti merci
but i must leav upon record i time joy wealth i got
i look upon stolen inde greatest part
i look upon hoard men good i rob innoc owner i ought word hang damn hereaft
and inde i began sincer hate dog wretch thief murder wretch condit nobodi ever i rob though i wealth yet imposs i ever make restitut upon account ran head i could never repent repent could sincer without restitut therefor must necess damn
there room escap
i went heart full thought littl better distract fellow short run headlong dreadfullest despair premedit noth rid world inde devil thing devil immedi follow work close noth lay upon mind sever day shoot head pistol
i vagrant life among infidel turk pagan sort peopl
i minist christian convers poor william
he ghost father confessor comfort i
as knowledg religion heard histori
you may suppos i much word god i rememb i ever read chapter bibl lifetim
i littl bob bussleton went school learn testament
howev pleas god make william quaker everyth
upon occas i took one even usual hurri away field hast ordinari short i told perplex mind terribl temptat devil i i must shoot i could support weight terror upon
shoot
say william
whi say i put end miser life
well say william satisfi next better
no say i much wors sure
whi say shoot devil motion doubt devil reason thou art ill case therefor thou must put thyself wors
this shock reason inde
well say i bear miser condit i
veri well say william seem bear wors condit shoot may past remedi
i past remedi alreadi say i how know
i satisfi said i well say sure shoot make certain though side death cannot sure damn yet moment step side time sure done said damn
well say william jest earnest pray didst thou dream last night
whi said i i fright dream night particular i dream devil came ask name i told
then ask trade i
say i i thief rogu call i pirat murder ought hang
ay ay say devil man i look therefor come along
at i horribl fright cri wake i horribl agoni ever sinc
veri well say william come give pistol thou talkedst
whi say i
do
say william
whi thou needest shoot thyself i shall oblig thee
whi thou wilt destroy us
what mean william
said i mean
said nay didst thou mean cri aloud thi sleep i thief pirat murder ought hang
whi thou wilt ruin us
twas well dutchman understand english
in short i must shoot thee save life
come come say give thi pistol
i confess terrifi anoth way i began sensibl anybodi near understand english i undon
the thought shoot forsook time i turn william you disord extrem william said i i never safe safe keep compani
what shall i
i shall betray
come come friend bob say i put end take advic
how
said i whi say next time thou talkest devil thou wilt talk littl softlier shall undon
this fright i must confess allay great deal troubl mind i
but william done jest enter upon long serious discours natur circumst repent ought attend inde deep abhorr crime i charg despair god merci part repent put condit devil inde i must appli sincer humbl confess crime ask pardon god i offend cast upon his merci
and told method resolv upon told found comfort
i great deal satisfact william discours quiet much william anxious ever talk sleep took care lie alway keep lodg hous much word english understood
howev like occas afterward i much compos mind resolv futur live quit differ life i done
as wealth i i look upon noth i resolv set apart opportun justic god put hand miracul opportun i afterward appli part preserv ruin famili i plunder may worth read i room account
with resolut i began restor degre quiet mind almost three month stay bassorah dispos good great quantiti left hire boat accord dutchman direct went bagdad babylon river tigri rather euphrat
we consider cargo good us therefor made great figur receiv respect
we particular two forti bale indian stuff sundri sort silk muslin fine chintz fifteen bale fine china silk seventi pack bale spice particular clove nutmeg good
we bid money clove dutchman advis us part told us get better price aleppo levant prepar caravan
we conceal gold pearl much could therefor sold three four bale china silk indian calico rais money buy camel pay custom taken sever place provis desert
i travel journey careless last degre good wealth believ i came rapin violenc god would direct taken manner inde i think i might say i will
but i merci protector i faith steward counsellor partner whatev i might call guid pilot governor everyth took care though never part world yet took care upon nine fifti day arriv bassorah mouth river tigri euphrat desert aleppo alexandria call scanderoon
here william i two faith comrad debat william i resolv separ two resolv go dutchman holland mean dutch ship lay road
william i told resolv go settl morea belong venetian
it true act wise let know whither went see resolv separ took old doctor direct write holland england might intellig occas promis give account write us afterward may time made
we stay time gone till length thorough resolv whither go till venetian ship touch cyprus put scanderoon look freight home
we took hint bargain passag freight good embark venic two twenti day arriv safe treasur cargo take good money jewel togeth i believ never brought citi two singl men sinc state venic
we kept incognito great pass two armenian merchant still done time gotten much persian armenian jargon talk bassorah bagdad everywher came countri suffici make us abl talk one anoth understood anybodi though sometim hard
here convert effect money settl abod consider time william i maintain inviol friendship fidel one anoth live like two brother neither sought separ interest convers serious grave upon subject repent continu never chang say leav armenian garb call venic two
i two three time go give detail wealth appear incred greatest difficulti world conceal just apprehens lest might assassin countri treasur
at length william told began think must never see england inde much concern see gain great wealth poor relat england i will would write know live know condit found aliv thought would consent send someth better condit
i consent will accord william wrote sister uncl five week time receiv answer direct cover hard armenian name given viz
signor constantin alexion ispahan venic
it move letter receiv sister passion express joy hear aliv see long ago account murder pirat west indi entreat let know circumst tell capac anyth consider welcom heart left widow four children kept littl shop minori made shift maintain famili sent five
i could see letter brought tear eye read inde show littl bill five pound upon english merchant venic brought tear eye
after affect suffici tender kind letter turn say what shall i poor woman
i muse last say i i tell shall
she sent five pound four children five sum poor woman circumst much five thousand pound us shall send bill exchang five thousand pound english money bid conceal surpris till hear bid leav shop go take hous somewher countri far london stay moder figur till
now say william i perceiv thought ventur england
inde william said i mistak present occur ventur done may seen
whi i desir keep relat pure keep compani
william look affection upon
nay say embark togeth long come togeth far i resolv i never part thee long i live go thou wilt stay thou wilt sister said william i cannot send sum money whose money
it thine
no william said i penni mine i anyth equal share therefor shall send i send
whi say william make poor woman distract surpris go wit
well said i william may prudent send bill back hundr pound bid expect post two send enough live without keep shop send
accord william sent kind letter bill upon merchant london hundr sixti pound bid comfort hope abl littl time send
about ten day sent anoth bill five hundr forti pound post two anoth three hundr pound make thousand pound told would send suffici leav shop direct take hous
he wait till receiv answer three letter account receiv money i expect let acquaint know receiv shill anybodi much aliv would till heard
when show letter well william said i woman fit trust life anyth send rest five thousand pound i ventur england woman hous whenev
in word sent five thousand pound good bill receiv punctual littl time sent brother word pretend uncl sick could carri trade longer taken larg hous four mile london pretenc let lodg livelihood short intim understood intend come incognito assur retir pleas
this open door us thought effectu shut life word resolv ventur keep entir conceal name everi circumst accord william sent sister word kind took prudent step guess right desir retir oblig increas figur live privat till might perhap see
he go send letter away
come william said i send empti letter tell friend come must retir i send five thousand pound
so short made poor woman famili rich yet came point heart fail i durst ventur william would stir without stay two year consid
you may think perhap i prodig ill gotten good thus load stranger bounti give gift like princ one abl merit noth inde know condit ought consid case though i money profus yet i perfect destitut friend world least oblig assist knew either dispos trust anyth i
when i reflect upon manner get i sometim give charit use debt due mankind though i roman cathol opinion would purchas repos soul i thought got general plunder i could make satisfact due communiti i ought distribut general good
but still i loss settl chariti dare go home countri lest comrad stroll home see detect spoil money purchas pardon betray expos untim end
be thus destitut i say friend i pitch thus upon william sister kind step brother thought distress signifi generous mind charit disposit resolv make object first bounti i doubt i purchas someth refug kind centr i tend futur action realli man subsist resid
it i told two year upward remain venic thereabout greatest hesit imagin irresolut unfix last degre
william sister importun us daili come england wonder dare trust degre oblig faith manner lament suspect us
at last i began inclin i said william come brother william said i ever sinc discours bassorah i call brother agre two three thing i go home england heart
say william let know
whi first say i shall disclos relat england sister one second shave mustachio beard along worn beard grecian manner leav long vest may pass grecian foreign third shall never speak english public anybodi sister except fourth alway live togeth pass brother
william said would agre heart speak english would hardest would best word agre go venic napl convert larg sum money bale silk left larg sum merchant hand venic anoth consider sum napl took bill exchang great deal yet came cargo london american merchant
and plain told i come england i bold own life i led abroad time leav say present lest will inquir nice old friend captain bob
