he got good estat merchandis leav trade live afterward york whenc marri mother whose relat name robinson good famili countri i call robinson kreutznaer usual corrupt word england call nay call write name cruso companion alway call
i two elder brother one lieuten colonel english regiment foot flander former command famous colonel lockhart kill battl near dunkirk spaniard
what becam second brother i never knew father mother knew becam
be third son famili bred trade head began fill earli rambl thought
my father ancient given compet share learn far hous educ countri free school general go design law i would satisfi noth go sea inclin led strong nay command father entreati persuas mother friend seem someth fatal propens natur tend direct life miseri befal
my father wise grave man gave serious excel counsel foresaw design
he call one morn chamber confin gout expostul warm upon subject
he ask reason mere wander inclin i leav father hous nativ countri i might well introduc prospect rais fortun applic industri life eas pleasur
he told men desper fortun one hand aspir superior fortun went abroad upon adventur rise enterpris make famous undertak natur common road thing either far far mine middl state might call upper station low life found long experi best state world suit human
he told i might judg happi state one thing viz
state life peopl envi king frequent lament miser consequ born great thing wish place middl two extrem mean great wise man gave testimoni standard felic pray neither poverti rich
he bade observ i alway find calam life share among upper lower part mankind middl station fewest disast expos mani vicissitud higher lower part mankind nay subject mani distemp uneasi either bodi mind vicious live luxuri extravag one hand hard labour want
after press earnest affection manner play young man precipit miseri natur station life i born seem provid i necess seek bread would well endeavour enter fair station life recommend i easi happi world must mere fate fault must hinder noth answer thus
i observ last part discours truli prophet though i suppos father know i say i observ tear run face plenti especi spoke brother kill spoke leisur repent none assist move broke discours told heart full could say
i sincer affect discours inde could otherwis
i resolv think go abroad settl home accord father desir
day wore short prevent father importun week i resolv run quit away
howev i act quit hastili first heat resolut prompt i took mother time i thought littl pleasant ordinari told thought entir bent upon see world i never settl anyth resolut enough go father better give consent forc go without i eighteen year old late go
this put mother great passion told knew would purpos speak father upon subject knew well interest give consent anyth much hurt wonder i could think thing discours i father kind tender express knew father use short i would ruin help i might depend i never
though mother refus move father yet i heard afterward report discours father show great concern said sigh that boy might happi would stay home goe abroad miser wretch ever born i give consent
it till almost year i broke loos though meantim i continu obstin deaf propos settl busi frequent expostul father mother posit determin knew inclin prompt
but one day hull i went casual without purpos make elop time i say one companion sail london father ship prompt go common allur seafar men cost noth passag i consult neither father mother much sent word leav hear might without ask god bless father without
never young adventur misfortun i believ began sooner continu longer mine
the ship sooner humber wind began blow sea rise fright manner i never sea i inexpress sick bodi terrifi mind
i began serious reflect upon i done just i overtaken judgment heaven wick leav father hous abandon duti
all good counsel parent father tear mother entreati came fresh mind conscienc yet come pitch hard sinc reproach contempt advic breach duti god father
all storm increas sea went high though noth like i seen mani time sinc i saw day enough affect young sailor never known anyth matter
i expect everi wave would swallow us everi time ship fell i thought trough hollow sea never rise agoni mind i made mani vow resolut would pleas god spare life one voyag ever i got foot upon dri land i would go direct home father never set ship i live i
now i saw plain good observ middl station life easi comfort live day never expos tempest sea troubl shore i resolv i would like true repent prodig go home father
these wise sober thought continu storm last inde time next day wind abat sea calmer i began littl inur howev i grave day also littl sea sick still toward night weather clear wind quit charm fine even follow sun went perfect clear rose next morn littl wind
i slept well night sea sick cheer look wonder upon sea rough terribl day could calm pleasant littl time
and lest good resolut continu companion entic away come well bob say clap upon shoulder
i warrant fright wer n last night blew cap wind
a cap call
said i twas terribl storm
a storm fool repli call storm
noth give us good ship sea room think noth squall wind fresh water sailor bob
come let us make bowl punch forget ye see charm weather tis
to make short sad part stori went way sailor punch made i made half drunk one night wicked i drown repent reflect upon past conduct resolut futur
in word sea return smooth surfac settl calm abat storm hurri thought fear apprehens swallow sea forgotten current former desir return i entir forgot vow promis i made distress
i found inde interv reflect serious thought endeavour return sometim i shook rous distemp appli drink compani soon master return fit i call i five six day got complet victori conscienc young fellow resolv troubl could desir
but i anoth trial still provid case general resolv leav entir without excus i would take deliver next one worst harden wretch among us would confess danger merci
the sixth day sea came yarmouth road wind contrari weather calm made littl way sinc storm
here oblig come anchor lay wind continu contrari viz
south west seven eight day time great mani ship newcastl came road common harbour ship might wait wind river
we howev rid long tide river wind blew fresh lain four five day blew hard
howev road reckon good harbour anchorag good ground tackl strong men unconcern least apprehens danger spent time rest mirth manner sea eighth day morn wind increas hand work strike topmast make everyth snug close ship might ride easi possibl
by noon sea went high inde ship rode forecastl ship sever sea thought twice anchor come home upon master order sheet anchor rode two anchor ahead cabl veer bitter end
by time blew terribl storm inde i began see terror amaz face even seamen
the master though vigil busi preserv ship yet went cabin i could hear soft say sever time lord merci us
shall lost
shall undon
like
dure first hurri i stupid lie still cabin steerag cannot describ temper i could ill resum first penit i appar trampl upon harden i thought bitter death past would noth like first master came i said said lost i dread fright
i got cabin look dismal sight i never saw sea ran mountain high broke upon us everi three four minut i could look i could see noth distress round us two ship rode near us found cut mast board deep laden men cri ship rode mile ahead us founder
two ship driven anchor run road sea adventur mast stand
the light ship fare best much labour sea two three drove came close us run away spritsail wind
toward even mate boatswain beg master ship let cut away fore mast unwil boatswain protest ship would founder consent cut away fore mast main mast stood loos shook ship much oblig cut away also make clear deck
ani one may judg condit i must young sailor fright littl
but i express distanc thought i time i tenfold horror mind upon account former convict return resolut i wick taken first i death ad terror storm put condit i word describ
but worst come yet storm continu furi seamen acknowledg never seen wors
we good ship deep laden wallow sea seamen everi cri would founder
it advantag one respect i know meant founder till i inquir
howev storm violent i saw often seen master boatswain other sensibl rest prayer expect everi moment ship would go bottom
in middl night rest distress one men see cri sprung leak anoth said four feet water hold
then hand call pump
at word heart i thought die within i fell backward upon side bed i sat cabin
howev men rous told i abl noth well abl pump anoth i stir went pump work heartili
while master see light collier abl ride storm oblig slip run away sea would come near us order fire gun signal distress
i knew noth meant thought ship broken dread thing happen
in word i surpris i fell swoon
as time everybodi life think nobodi mind becom anoth man step pump thrust asid foot let lie think i dead great i came
we work water increas hold appar ship would founder though storm began abat littl yet possibl could swim till might run port master continu fire gun help light ship rid ahead us ventur boat help us
it utmost hazard boat came near us imposs us get board boat lie near ship side till last men row heartili ventur live save men cast rope stern buoy veer great length much labour hazard took hold haul close stern got boat
it purpos us boat think reach ship agre let drive pull toward shore much could master promis boat stave upon shore would make good master part row part drive boat went away northward slope toward shore almost far winterton ness
we much quarter hour ship till saw sink i understood first time meant ship founder sea
i must acknowledg i hard eye look seamen told sink moment rather put boat i might said go heart dead within part fright part horror mind thought yet
while condit men yet labour oar bring boat near shore could see boat mount wave abl see shore great mani peopl run along strand assist us come near made slow way toward shore abl reach shore till past lighthous winterton shore fall westward toward cromer
here got though without much difficulti got safe shore walk afterward foot yarmouth unfortun men use great human well magistr town assign us good quarter particular merchant owner ship money given us suffici carri us either london back hull thought fit
had i sens gone back hull gone home i happi father bless saviour parabl even kill fat calf hear ship i went away cast away yarmouth road great assur i drown
but ill fate push obstinaci noth could resist though i sever time loud call reason compos judgment go home yet i power
i know call i urg secret overrul decre hurri us instrument destruct even though us rush upon eye open
certain noth decre unavoid miseri imposs escap could push forward calm reason persuas retir thought two visibl instruct i met first attempt
my comrad help harden master son less forward i the first time spoke yarmouth till two three day separ town sever quarter i say first time saw appear tone alter look melancholi shake head ask i tell father i i come voyag trial order go abroad father turn
whi sir said i go sea
that anoth case said call therefor duti made voyag trial see tast heaven given expect persist
perhap befallen us account like jonah ship tarshish
pray continu account go sea
upon i told stori end burst strang kind passion what i done say unhappi wretch come ship
i would set foot ship thee thousand pound
this inde i said excurs spirit yet agit sens loss farther could author go
howev afterward talk grave exhort go back father tempt provid ruin tell i might see visibl hand heaven
and young man said depend upon go back wherev go meet noth disast disappoint till father word fulfil upon
we part soon i made littl answer i saw way went i knew
as money pocket i travel london land well road mani struggl cours life i take whether i go home sea
as go home shame oppos best motion offer thought immedi occur i laugh among neighbour asham see father mother even everybodi els whenc i sinc often observ incongru irrat common temper mankind especi youth reason ought guid case viz
asham sin yet asham repent asham action ought just esteem fool asham return make esteem wise men
in state life howev i remain time uncertain measur take cours life lead
an irresist reluct continu go home i stay away remembr distress i wore abat littl motion i desir return wore till last i quit laid asid thought look voyag
chapter ii slaveri and escap that evil influenc carri first away father hous hurri wild indigest notion rais fortun impress conceit forcibl upon make deaf good advic entreati even command father i say influenc whatev present unfortun enterpris view i went
it great misfortun adventur i ship sailor though i might inde work littl harder ordinari yet time i learnt duti offic fore mast man time might qualifi mate lieuten master
but alway fate choos wors i money pocket good cloth upon back i would alway go board habit gentleman i neither busi ship learn
it lot first fall pretti good compani london alway happen loos misguid young fellow i devil general omit lay snare earli
i first got acquaint master ship coast guinea good success resolv go
this captain take fanci convers disagre time hear say i mind see world told i would go voyag i expens i messmat companion i could carri anyth i advantag trade would admit perhap i might meet encourag
i embrac offer enter strict friendship captain honest plain deal man i went voyag carri small adventur disinterest honesti friend captain i increas consider i carri 40 toy trifl captain direct buy
these 40 i muster togeth assist relat i correspond i believ got father least mother contribut much first adventur
this voyag i may say success adventur i owe integr honesti friend captain also i got compet knowledg mathemat rule navig learn keep account ship cours take observ short understand thing need understood sailor took delight instruct i took delight learn word
yet even voyag i misfortun particular i continu sick thrown violent calentur excess heat climat princip trade upon coast latitud 15 degre north even line
i set guinea trader friend great misfortun die soon arriv i resolv go voyag i embark vessel one mate former voyag got command ship
this unhappiest voyag ever man made though i carri quit 100 new gain wealth i 200 left i lodg friend widow yet i fell terribl misfortun
the first ship make cours toward canari island rather island african shore surpris grey morn turkish rover salle gave chase us sail could make
we crowd also much canva yard would spread mast carri get clear find pirat gain upon us would certain come us hour prepar fight ship twelv gun rogu eighteen
about three afternoon came us bring mistak athwart quarter instead athwart stern intend brought eight gun bear side pour broadsid upon made sheer return fire pour also small shot near two hundr men board
howev man touch men keep close
he prepar attack us defend
but lay us board next time upon quarter enter sixti men upon deck immedi fell cut hack sail rig
we pli small shot half pike powder chest like clear deck twice
howev cut short melancholi part stori ship disabl three men kill eight wound oblig yield carri prison salle port belong moor
the usag i dread first i apprehend i carri countri emperor court rest men kept captain rover proper prize made slave young nimbl fit busi
at surpris chang circumst merchant miser slave i perfect overwhelm i look back upon father prophet discours i miser none reliev i thought effectu brought pass i could wors hand heaven overtaken i undon without redempt ala
tast miseri i go appear sequel stori
as new patron master taken home hous i hope would take went sea believ would time fate taken spanish portug man war i set liberti
but hope mine soon taken away went sea left shore look littl garden common drudgeri slave hous came home cruis order lie cabin look ship
here i medit noth escap method i might take effect found way least probabl noth present make supposit ration i nobodi communic would embark fellow slave englishman irishman scotchman two year though i often pleas imagin yet i never least encourag prospect
after two year odd circumst present put old thought make attempt liberti head
my patron lie home longer usual without fit ship i heard want money use constant twice week sometim often weather fair take ship pinnac go road fish alway took young maresco row boat made merri i prove dexter catch fish insomuch sometim would send moor one
it happen one time go fish calm morn fog rose thick though half leagu shore lost sight row knew whither way labour day next night morn came found pull sea instead pull shore least two leagu shore
howev got well though great deal labour danger wind began blow pretti fresh morn hungri
but patron warn disast resolv take care futur lie longboat english ship taken resolv would go fish without compass provis order carpent ship also english slave build littl state room cabin middl long boat like barg place stand behind steer haul home main
she sail call shoulder mutton sail boom jibe top cabin lay snug low room lie slave two tabl eat small locker put bottl liquor thought fit drink bread rice coffe
we went frequent boat fish i dexter catch fish never went without
it happen appoint go boat either pleasur fish two three moor distinct place provid extraordinarili therefor sent board boat overnight larger store provis ordinari order get readi three fuse powder shot board ship design sport fowl well fish
i got thing readi direct wait next morn boat wash clean ancient pendant everyth accommod guest patron came board alon told guest put go busi fell order man boy usual go boat catch fish friend sup hous command soon i got fish i bring home hous i prepar
this moment former notion deliver dart thought i found i like littl ship command master gone i prepar furnish fish busi voyag though i knew neither i much consid whither i steer anywher get place desir
my first contriv make pretenc speak moor get someth subsist board i told must presum eat patron bread
he said true brought larg basket rusk biscuit three jar fresh water boat
i knew patron case bottl stood evid make taken english prize i convey boat moor shore master
i convey also great lump beeswax boat weigh half hundr weight parcel twine thread hatchet saw hammer great use us afterward especi wax make candl
anoth trick i tri upon innoc came also name ismael call muley moeli i call moeli said i patron gun board boat get littl powder shot
it may may kill alcami fowl like curlew i know keep gunner store ship
yes say i bring accord brought great leather pouch held pound half powder rather anoth shot five six pound bullet put boat
at time i found powder master great cabin i fill one larg bottl case almost empti pour anoth thus furnish everyth need sail port fish
the castl entranc port knew took notic us mile port haul sail set us fish
the wind blew n n e contrari desir blown souther i sure made coast spain least reach bay cadiz resolut blow way would i would gone horrid place i leav rest fate
after fish time caught noth i fish hook i would pull might see i said moor this master thus serv must stand farther
he think harm agre head boat set sail i helm i ran boat near leagu farther brought i would fish give boy helm i step forward moor make i stoop someth behind i took surpris arm waist toss clear overboard sea
he rose immedi swam like cork call beg taken told would go world
he swam strong boat would reach quick littl wind upon i step cabin fetch one fowl piec i present told i done hurt would quiet i would none
but said i swim well enough reach shore sea calm make best way shore i harm come near boat i shoot head i resolv liberti turn swam shore i make doubt reach eas excel swimmer
i could content taken moor drown boy ventur trust
when gone i turn boy call xuri said xuri faith i make great man stroke face true swear mahomet father beard i must throw sea
the boy smile face spoke innoc i could distrust swore faith go world
while i view moor swim i stood direct sea boat rather stretch windward might think gone toward strait mouth inde one wit must suppos would suppos sail southward truli barbarian coast whole nation negro sure surround us cano destroy us could go shore devour
but soon grew dusk even i chang cours steer direct south east bend cours littl toward east i might keep shore fair fresh gale wind smooth quiet sea i made sail i believ next day three clock afternoon i first made land i could less one hundr fifti mile
yet fright i taken moor dread apprehens i fall hand i would stop go shore come anchor wind continu fair till i sail manner five day wind shift southward i conclud also vessel chase also would give i ventur make coast came anchor mouth littl river i knew
i neither saw desir see peopl princip thing i want fresh water
we came creek even resolv swim shore soon dark discov countri soon quit dark heard dread nois bark roar howl wild creatur knew kind poor boy readi die fear beg go shore till day
well xuri said i i may may see men day bad us lion
then give shoot gun say xuri laugh make run wey
such english xuri spoke convers among us slave
howev i glad see boy cheer i gave dram patron case bottl cheer
after xuri advic good i took drop littl anchor lay still night i say still slept none two three hour saw vast great creatur knew call mani sort come sea shore run water wallow wash pleasur cool made hideous howl yell i never inde heard like
xuri dread fright inde i fright heard one mighti creatur come swim toward boat could see might hear blow monstrous huge furious beast
xuri said lion might aught i know poor xuri cri weigh anchor row away no say i xuri slip cabl buoy go sea cannot follow us far
i sooner said i perceiv creatur whatev within two oar length someth surpris howev i immedi step cabin door take gun fire upon immedi turn swam toward shore
but imposs describ horrid nois hideous cri howl rais well upon edg shore higher within countri upon nois report gun thing i reason believ creatur never heard convinc go shore us night coast ventur shore day anoth question fallen hand savag bad fallen hand
be would oblig go shore somewher water pint left boat get point
xuri said i would let go shore one jar would find water bring
i ask would go
i go stay boat
the boy answer much affect made love ever
say if wild man come eat go wey
well xuri said i go wild man come kill shall eat neither us
so i gave xuri piec rusk bread eat dram patron case bottl i mention haul boat near shore thought proper wade shore carri noth arm two jar water
i care go sight boat fear come cano savag river boy see low place mile countri rambl i saw come run toward
i thought pursu savag fright wild beast i ran forward toward help i came nearer i saw someth hang shoulder creatur shot like hare differ colour longer leg howev glad good meat great joy poor xuri came tell found good water seen wild man
but found afterward need take pain water littl higher creek found water fresh tide flow littl way fill jar feast hare kill prepar go way seen footstep human creatur part countri
as i one voyag coast i knew well island canari cape de verd island also lay far coast
but i instrument take observ know latitud exact know least rememb latitud i knew look stand sea toward otherwis i might easili found island
but hope i stood along coast till i came part english trade i find vessel upon usual design trade would reliev take us
by best calcul place i must countri lie emperor morocco dominion negro lie wast uninhabit except wild beast negro abandon gone farther south fear moor moor think worth inhabit reason barren inde forsak prodigi number tiger lion leopard furious creatur
onc twice daytim i thought i saw pico teneriff high top mountain teneriff canari great mind ventur hope reach thither tri twice i forc contrari wind sea also go high littl vessel i resolv pursu first design keep along shore
sever time i oblig land fresh water left place particular earli morn came anchor littl point land pretti high tide begin flow lay still go farther
xuri whose eye seem mine call soft tell best go farther shore for say look yonder lie dread monster side hillock fast asleep
i look point saw dread monster inde terribl great lion lay side shore shade piec hill hung littl
xuri say i shall shore kill
xuri look fright said me kill
eat one mouth
one mouth meant
howev i said boy bade lie still i took biggest gun almost musket bore load good charg powder two slug laid i load anoth gun two bullet third three piec i load five smaller bullet
i took best aim i could first piec shot head lay leg rais littl nose slug hit leg knee broke bone
he start growl first find leg broken fell got upon three leg gave hideous roar ever i heard
i littl surpris i hit head howev i took second piec immedi though began move fire shot head pleasur see drop make littl nois lie struggl life
then xuri took heart would let go shore
well go said i boy jump water take littl gun one hand swam shore hand come close creatur put muzzl piec ear shot head despatch quit
this game inde us food i sorri lose three charg powder shot upon creatur good noth us
howev xuri said would come board ask give hatchet
for xuri
said i me cut head said
howev xuri could cut head cut foot brought monstrous great one
i bethought howev perhap skin might one way valu us i resolv take skin i could
so xuri i went work xuri much better workman i knew ill
inde took us whole day last got hide spread top cabin sun effectu dri two day time afterward serv lie upon
chapter iii wreck on a desert island after stop made southward continu ten twelv day live spare provis began abat much go often shore oblig fresh water
my design make river gambia seneg say anywher cape de verd i hope meet european ship i i knew cours i take seek island perish among negro
i knew ship europ sail either coast guinea brazil east indi made cape island word i put whole fortun upon singl point either i must meet ship must perish
when i pursu resolut ten day longer i said i began see land inhabit two three place sail saw peopl stand upon shore look us could also perceiv quit black nake
i inclin gone shore xuri better counsellor said no go go
howev i haul nearer shore i might talk i found ran along shore good way
i observ weapon hand except one long slender stick xuri said lanc could throw great way good aim i kept distanc talk sign well i could particular made sign someth eat beckon stop boat would fetch meat
upon i lower top sail lay two ran countri less half hour came back brought two piec dri flesh corn produc countri neither knew one howev will accept come next disput i would ventur shore much afraid us took safe way us brought shore laid went stood great
we made sign thank noth make amend opportun offer instant oblig wonder lie shore came two mighti creatur one pursu took great furi mountain toward sea whether male pursu femal whether sport rage could tell could tell whether usual strang i believ latter
the man lanc dart fli rest howev two creatur ran direct water offer fall upon negro plung sea swam come divers last one began come nearer boat first i expect i lay readi i load gun possibl expedit bade xuri load other
as soon came fair within reach i fire shot direct head immedi sank water rose instant plung struggl life inde immedi made shore wound mortal hurt strangl water die reach shore
it imposs express astonish poor creatur nois fire gun even readi die fear fell dead terror saw creatur dead sunk water i made sign come shore took heart came began search creatur
i found blood stain water help rope i slung round gave negro haul drag shore found curious leopard spot fine admir degre negro held hand admir think i kill
the creatur fright flash fire nois gun swam shore ran direct mountain whenc came could i distanc know
i found quick negro wish eat flesh creatur i will take favour i made sign might take thank
immedi fell work though knife yet sharpen piec wood took skin readili much readili could done knife
they offer flesh i declin point i would give made sign skin gave freeli brought great deal provis though i understand yet i accept
i made sign water held one jar turn bottom upward show empti i want fill
they call immedi friend came two women brought great vessel made earth burnt i suppos sun set i sent xuri shore jar fill three
the women nake men
i furnish root corn water leav friend negro i made forward eleven day without offer go near shore till i saw land run great length sea distanc four five leagu sea calm i kept larg of make point
at length doubl point two leagu land i saw plain land side seaward i conclud certain inde cape de verd island call thenc cape de verd island
howev great distanc i could well tell i best i taken fresh wind i might neither reach one
in dilemma i pensiv i step cabin sat xuri helm sudden boy cri master master ship sail
foolish boy fright wit think must need master ship sent pursu us i knew far enough reach
i jump cabin immedi saw ship portugues ship i thought bound coast guinea negro
but i observ cours steer i soon convinc bound way design come nearer shore upon i stretch sea much i could resolv speak possibl
with sail i could make i found i abl come way would gone i could make signal i crowd utmost began despair seem saw help glass european boat suppos must belong ship lost shorten sail let come
i encourag i patron ancient board i made waft signal distress fire gun saw told saw smoke though hear gun
upon signal kind brought lay three hour time i came
they ask i portugues spanish french i understood none last scotch sailor board call i answer told i englishman i made escap slaveri moor salle bade come board kind took good
it inexpress joy one believ i thus deliv i esteem miser almost hopeless condit i i immedi offer i captain ship return deliver generous told would take noth i deliv safe i came brazil
for say i save life term i would glad save may one time lot taken condit
besid said i carri brazil great way countri i take starv i take away life i given
no say seignior ingles mr englishman i carri thither chariti thing help buy subsist passag home
as charit propos perform tittl order seamen none touch anyth i took everyth possess gave back exact inventori i might even three earthen jar
as boat good one saw told would buy ship use ask i would
i told generous everyth i could offer make price boat left entir upon told would give note hand pay eighti piec eight brazil came one offer give would make
he offer also sixti piec eight boy xuri i loth take i unwil let captain i loth sell poor boy liberti assist faith procur
howev i let know reason own offer medium would give boy oblig set free ten year turn christian upon xuri say will go i let captain
we good voyag brazil i arriv bay de todo los santo all saint bay twenti two day
and i deliv miser condit life next i consid
the generous treatment captain gave i never enough rememb would take noth passag gave twenti ducat leopard skin forti lion skin i boat caus everyth i ship punctual deliv i will sell bought case bottl two gun piec lump beeswax i made candl rest word i made
i long i recommend hous good honest man like ingenio call plantat sugar hous
i live time acquaint mean manner plant make sugar see well planter live got rich sudden i resolv i could get licenc settl i would turn planter among resolv meantim find way get money i left london remit
to purpos get kind letter naturalis i purchas much land uncur money would reach form plan plantat settlement one might suitabl stock i propos receiv england
i neighbour portugues lisbon born english parent whose name well much circumst i
i call neighbour plantat lay next mine went sociabl togeth
my stock low well rather plant food anyth els two year
howev began increas land began come order third year plant tobacco made us larg piec ground readi plant cane year come
but want help i found i done wrong part boy xuri
wrong never right great wonder
i hail remedi go i got employ quit remot genius direct contrari life i delight i forsook father hous broke good advic
nay i come middl station upper degre low life father advis i resolv go i might well stay home never fatigu world i done i use often say i could done well england among friend gone five thousand mile among stranger savag wilder distanc never hear part world
in manner i use look upon condit utmost regret
i nobodi convers neighbour work done labour hand i use say i live like man cast away upon desol island nobodi
but men reflect compar present condit other wors heaven may oblig make exchang convinc former felic experi i say truli solitari life i reflect island mere desol lot often unjust compar life i led i continu i probabl exceed prosper rich
i degre settl measur carri plantat kind friend captain ship took sea went back ship remain provid lade prepar voyag near three month tell littl stock i left behind london gave friend sincer advic seignior ingles say alway call give letter procur form order
this wholesom advic look friend i could convinc best cours i could take i accord prepar letter gentlewoman i left money procur portugues captain desir
i wrote english captain widow full account adventur slaveri escap i met portugues captain sea human behaviour condit i necessari direct suppli honest captain came lisbon found mean english merchant send order full account stori merchant london repres
the merchant london vest hundr pound english good captain written sent direct lisbon brought safe brazil among without direct i young busi think taken care sort tool ironwork utensil necessari plantat great use
when cargo arriv i thought fortun made i surpris joy stood steward captain laid five pound friend sent present purchas bring servant bond six year servic would accept consider except littl tobacco i would accept produc
neither good english manufactur cloth stuff baiz thing particular valuabl desir countri i found mean sell great advantag i might say i four time valu first cargo infinit beyond poor neighbour i mean advanc plantat first thing i i bought negro slave
but abus prosper oftentim made mean greatest advers
i went next year great success plantat i rais fifti great roll tobacco ground i dispos necessari among neighbour fifti roll hundredweight well cure laid return fleet lisbon increas busi wealth head began full project undertak beyond reach inde often ruin
had i continu station i i room happi thing yet befallen father earnest recommend quiet retir life sensibl describ middl station life full thing attend i still wil agent miseri particular increas fault doubl reflect upon futur sorrow i leisur make
as i done thus break away parent i could content i must go leav happi view i rich thrive man new plantat pursu rash immoder desir rise faster natur thing admit thus i cast deepest gulf human miseri ever man fell perhap could consist life state health world
to come degre particular part stori
you may suppos live almost four year brazil begin thrive prosper well upon plantat i learn languag contract acquaint friendship among fellow planter well among merchant st salvador port discours among i frequent given account two voyag coast guinea manner
negro servic brazil great number
they listen alway attent discours head especi part relat buy negro trade time far enter far carri assiento permiss king spain portug engross public stock negro bought excess dear
it happen compani merchant planter acquaint talk thing earnest three came next morn told muse much upon i discours last night came make secret propos enjoin secreci told mind fit ship go guinea plantat well i straiten noth much servant trade could carri
this fair propos must confess made one settlement plantat look fair way come consider good stock upon thus enter establish noth go i begun three four year sent hundr pound england time littl addit could scarc fail worth three four thousand pound sterl
but i born destroy could resist offer i could restrain first rambl design father good counsel lost upon
in word i told i would go heart would undertak look plantat absenc would dispos i direct i miscarri
this engag enter write coven i made formal dispos plantat effect case death make captain ship save life univers heir oblig dispos effect i direct one half produc ship england
in short i took possibl caution preserv effect keep plantat
had i use half much prudenc look interest made judgment i ought done done i certain never gone away prosper undertak leav probabl view thrive circumst gone upon voyag sea attend common hazard say noth reason i expect particular misfortun
but i hurri obey blind dictat fanci rather reason accord ship fit cargo furnish thing done agreement partner voyag i went board evil hour 1st septemb 1659 day eight year i went father mother hull order act rebel author fool interest
our ship one hundr twenti ton burden carri six gun fourteen men besid master boy
we board larg cargo good except toy fit trade negro bead bit glass shell trifl especi littl look glass knive scissor hatchet like
the day i went board set sail stand away northward upon coast design stretch african coast came ten twelv degre northern latitud seem manner cours day
we good weather excess hot way upon coast till came height cape st augustino whenc keep sea lost sight land steer bound isl fernando de noronha hold cours n e n leav isl east
in cours pass line twelv day time last observ seven degre twenti two minut northern latitud violent tornado hurrican took us quit knowledg
it began south east came north west settl north east whenc blew terribl manner twelv day togeth could noth drive scud away let carri us whither fate furi wind direct twelv day i need say i expect everi day swallow inde ship expect save live
in distress besid terror storm one men die calentur one man boy wash overboard
about twelfth day weather abat littl master made observ well could found eleven degre north latitud twenti two degre longitud differ west cape st augustino found upon coast guiana north part brazil beyond river amazon toward river orinoco common call great
i posit look chart sea coast america conclud inhabit countri us recours till came within circl caribbe island therefor resolv stand away barbado keep sea avoid indraft bay gulf mexico might easili perform hope fifteen day sail wherea could possibl make
with design chang cours steer away n w w order reach english island i hope relief
but voyag otherwis determin latitud twelv degre eighteen minut second storm came upon us carri us away impetuos westward drove us way human commerc live save sea rather danger devour savag ever return countri
in distress wind still blow hard one men earli morn cri land
sooner run cabin look hope see whereabout world ship struck upon sand moment motion stop sea broke manner expect perish immedi immedi driven close quarter shelter us foam spray sea
it easi one like condit describ conceiv constern men circumst
we knew noth upon land driven whether island main whether inhabit inhabit
as rage wind still great though rather less first could much hope ship hold mani minut without break piec unless wind kind miracl turn immedi
in word sat look upon one anoth expect death everi moment everi man accord prepar anoth world littl noth us
that present comfort comfort contrari expect ship break yet master said wind began abat
now though thought wind littl abat yet ship thus struck upon sand stick fast us expect get dread condit inde noth think save live well could
we boat stern storm first stave dash ship rudder next place broke away either sunk driven sea hope
we anoth boat board get sea doubt thing
howev time debat fanci ship would break piec everi minut told us actual broken alreadi
in distress mate vessel laid hold boat help rest men got slung ship side get let go commit eleven number god merci wild sea though storm abat consider yet sea ran dread high upon shore might well call den wild zee dutch call sea storm
and case dismal inde saw plain sea went high boat could live inevit drown
as make sail none could done anyth work oar toward land though heavi heart like men go execut knew boat came near shore would dash thousand piec breach sea
howev commit soul god earnest manner wind drive us toward shore hasten destruct hand pull well could toward land
what shore whether rock sand whether steep shoal knew
the hope could ration give us least shadow expect might find bay gulf mouth river great chanc might run boat got lee land perhap made smooth water
but noth like appear made nearer nearer shore land look fright sea
after row rather driven leagu half reckon rage wave mountain like came roll astern us plain bade us expect coup de gr ce
it took us furi overset boat separ us well boat one anoth gave us time say o god
swallow moment
noth describ confus thought i felt i sank water though i swam well yet i could deliv wave draw breath till wave driven rather carri vast way toward shore spent went back left upon land almost dri half dead water i took
i much presenc mind well breath left see nearer mainland i expect i got upon feet endeavour make toward land fast i could anoth wave return take i soon found imposs avoid i saw sea come high great hill furious enemi i mean strength contend busi hold breath
the wave came upon buri twenti thirti feet deep bodi i could feel carri mighti forc swift toward shore great way i held breath assist swim still forward might
i readi burst hold breath i felt rise immedi relief i found head hand shoot surfac water though two second time i could keep yet reliev great gave breath new courag
i cover water good long i held find water spent began return i struck forward return wave felt ground feet
i stood still moment recov breath till water went took heel ran strength i toward shore
but neither would deliv furi sea came pour twice i lift wave carri forward shore flat
the last time two well nigh fatal sea hurri along land rather dash piec rock forc left senseless inde helpless deliver blow take side breast beat breath quit bodi return immedi i must strangl water i recov littl return wave see i cover water i resolv hold
now wave high first nearer land i held hold till wave abat fetch anoth run brought near shore next wave though went yet swallow carri away next run i took i got mainland great comfort i clamber cliff shore sat upon grass free danger quit reach water
i land safe shore began look thank god life save case wherein minut scarc room hope
i believ imposs express life ecstasi transport soul save i may say grave i wonder custom malefactor halter neck tie go turn repriev brought i say i wonder bring surgeon let blood moment tell surpris may drive anim spirit heart overwhelm
for sudden joy like grief confound first
i walk shore lift hand whole i may say wrap contempl deliver make thousand gestur motion i cannot describ reflect upon comrad drown one soul save i never saw afterward sign except three hat one cap two shoe fellow
i cast eye strand vessel breach froth sea big i could hard see lay far consid lord
possibl i could get shore
after i solac mind comfort part condit i began look round see kind place i next done i soon found comfort abat word i dread deliver i wet cloth shift anyth either eat drink comfort neither i see prospect perish hunger devour wild beast particular afflict i
in word i noth knife tobacco pipe littl tobacco box
this provis threw terribl agoni mind i ran like madman
night come upon i began heavi heart consid would lot raven beast countri night alway come abroad prey
all remedi offer thought time get thick bushi tree like fir thorni grew near i resolv sit night consid next day death i die yet i saw prospect life
i walk furlong shore see i could find fresh water drink i great joy drank put littl tobacco mouth prevent hunger i went tree get endeavour place i sleep i might fall
and cut short stick like truncheon defenc i took lodg excess fatigu i fell fast asleep slept comfort i believ could done condit found refresh i think i ever occas
chapter iv first week on the island when i wake broad day weather clear storm abat sea rage swell
but surpris ship lift night sand lay swell tide driven almost far rock i first mention i bruis wave dash
this within mile shore i ship seem stand upright still i wish board least i might save necessari thing use
when i came apart tree i look first thing i found boat lay wind sea toss upon land two mile right hand
i walk far i could upon shore got found neck inlet water boat half mile broad i came back present intent upon get ship i hope find someth present subsist
a littl noon i found sea calm tide eb far i could come within quarter mile ship
and i found fresh renew grief i saw evid kept board safe say got safe shore i miser left entir destitut comfort compani i
this forc tear eye littl relief i resolv possibl get ship i pull cloth weather hot extrem took water
but i came ship difficulti still greater know get board lay aground high water noth within reach lay hold
i swam round twice second time i spi small piec rope i wonder i see first hung fore chain low great difficulti i got hold help rope i got forecastl ship
here i found ship bulg great deal water hold lay side bank hard sand rather earth stern lay lift upon bank head low almost water
by mean quarter free part dri may sure first work search see spoil free
and first i found ship provis dri untouch water well dispos eat i went bread room fill pocket biscuit ate i went thing i time lose
i also found rum great cabin i took larg dram i inde need enough spirit
now i want noth boat furnish mani thing i foresaw would necessari
it vain sit still wish extrem rous applic
we sever spare yard two three larg spar wood spare topmast two ship i resolv fall work i flung mani overboard i could manag weight tie everi one rope might drive away
when done i went ship side pull i tie four togeth end well i could form raft lay two three short piec plank upon crossway i found i could walk upon well abl bear great weight piec light
so i went work carpent saw i cut spare topmast three length ad raft great deal labour pain
but hope furnish necessari encourag go beyond i abl done upon anoth occas
my raft strong enough bear reason weight
my next care load preserv i laid upon surf sea i long consid
i first laid plank board upon i could get consid well i want i got three seamen chest i broken open empti lower upon raft first i fill provis viz
bread rice three dutch chees five piec dri goat flesh live much upon littl remaind european corn laid fowl brought sea us fowl kill
there barley wheat togeth great disappoint i found afterward rat eaten spoil
as liquor i found sever case bottl belong skipper cordial water five six gallon rack
these i stow need put chest room
while i i found tide begin flow though calm i mortif see coat shirt waistcoat i left shore upon sand swim away
as breech linen open kneed i swam board stock
howev set rummag cloth i found enough took i want present use i other thing eye upon first tool work shore
and long search i found carpent chest inde use prize much valuabl shipload gold would time
i got raft whole without lose time look i knew general contain
my next care ammunit arm
there two good fowl piec great cabin two pistol
these i secur first powder horn small bag shot two old rusti sword
i knew three barrel powder ship knew gunner stow much search i found two dri good third taken water
those two i got raft arm
and i thought pretti well freight began think i get shore neither sail oar rudder least cap wind would overset navig
i three encourag 1st smooth calm sea 2ndli tide rise set shore 3rdli littl wind blew toward land
and thus found two three broken oar belong boat besid tool chest i found two saw axe hammer cargo i put sea
for mile thereabout raft went well i found drive littl distant place i land i perceiv indraft water consequ i hope find creek river i might make use port get land cargo
as i imagin
there appear littl open land i found strong current tide set i guid raft well i could keep middl stream
but i like suffer second shipwreck i i think verili would broken heart know noth coast raft ran aground one end upon shoal aground end want littl cargo slip toward end afloat fallen water
i utmost set back chest keep place could thrust raft strength neither durst i stir postur i hold chest might i stood manner near half hour time rise water brought littl upon level littl water still rise raft float i thrust oar i channel drive higher i
i look side proper place get shore i will driven high river hope time see ship sea therefor resolv place near coast i could
at length i spi littl cove right shore creek great pain difficulti i guid raft last got near reach ground oar i could thrust direct
but i like dip cargo sea shore lie pretti steep say slope place land one end float ran shore would lie high sink lower would endang cargo
all i could wait till tide highest keep raft oar like anchor hold side fast shore near flat piec ground i expect water would flow
as soon i found water enough raft drew foot water i thrust upon flat piec ground fasten moor stick two broken oar ground one one side near one end one side near end thus i lay till water eb away left raft cargo safe shore
my next work view countri seek proper place habit stow good secur whatev might happen
where i i yet knew whether contin island whether inhabit inhabit whether danger wild beast
there hill mile rose steep high seem overtop hill lay ridg northward
i took one fowl piec one pistol horn powder thus arm i travel discoveri top hill i great labour difficulti got top i saw fate great afflict viz
i island environ everi way sea land seen except rock lay great way two small island less lay three leagu west
i found also island i barren i saw good reason believ uninhabit except wild beast howev i saw none
yet i saw abund fowl knew kind neither i kill could i tell fit food
at come back i shot great bird i saw sit upon tree side great wood
i believ first gun fire sinc creation world
i sooner fire part wood aros innumer number fowl mani sort make confus scream cri everi one accord usual note one kind i knew
as creatur i kill i took kind hawk colour beak resembl talon claw common
it flesh carrion fit noth
content discoveri i came back raft fell work bring cargo shore took rest day
what night i knew inde rest i afraid lie ground know wild beast might devour though i afterward found realli need fear
howev well i could i barricad round chest board i brought shore made kind hut night lodg
as food i yet saw way suppli except i seen two three creatur like hare run wood i shot fowl
i began consid i might yet get great mani thing ship would use particular rig sail thing might come land i resolv make anoth voyag board vessel possibl
and i knew first storm blew must necessarili break piec i resolv set thing apart till i got everyth ship i could get
then i call council say thought whether i take back raft appear impractic i resolv go tide i i strip i went hut noth chequer shirt pair linen drawer pair pump feet
i got board ship prepar second raft experi first i neither made unwieldi load hard yet i brought away sever thing use first carpent store i found two three bag full nail spike great screw jack dozen two hatchet use thing call grindston
all i secur togeth sever thing belong gunner particular two three iron crow two barrel musket bullet seven musket anoth fowl piec small quantiti powder larg bag small shot great roll sheet lead last heavi i could hoist get ship side
besid thing i took men cloth i could find spare fore topsail hammock bed i load second raft brought safe shore great comfort
i apprehens absenc land least provis might devour shore i came back i found sign visitor sat creatur like wild cat upon one chest i came toward ran away littl distanc stood still
she sat compos unconcern look full face mind acquaint
i present gun understand perfect unconcern offer stir away upon i toss bit biscuit though way i free store great howev i spare bit i say went smell ate look pleas i thank could spare march
have got second cargo shore though i fain open barrel powder bring parcel heavi larg cask i went work make littl tent sail pole i cut purpos tent i brought everyth i knew would spoil either rain sun i pile empti chest cask circl round tent fortifi sudden
when i done i block door tent board within empti chest set end without spread one bed upon ground lay two pistol head gun length i went bed first time slept quiet night i weari heavi night i slept littl labour hard day fetch thing ship get shore
i biggest magazin kind ever laid i believ one man i satisfi still ship sat upright postur i thought i ought get everyth i could everi day low water i went board brought away someth particular third time i went i brought away much rig i could also small
in word i brought away sail first last i fain cut piec bring much time i could use sail mere canva
but comfort still last i made five six voyag thought i noth expect ship worth meddl i say i found great hogshead bread three larg runlet rum spirit box sugar barrel fine flour surpris i given expect provis except spoil water
i soon empti hogshead bread wrap parcel parcel piec sail i cut word i got safe shore also
the next day i made anoth voyag plunder ship portabl fit hand i began cabl
cut great cabl piec i could move i got two cabl hawser shore ironwork i could get cut spritsail yard mizzen yard everyth i could make larg raft i load heavi good came away
but good luck began leav raft unwieldi overladen i enter littl cove i land rest good abl guid handili i overset threw cargo water
as great harm i near shore cargo great part lost especi iron i expect would great use howev tide i got piec cabl ashor iron though infinit labour i fain dip water work fatigu much
after i went everi day board brought away i could get
i thirteen day shore eleven time board ship time i brought away one pair hand could well suppos capabl bring though i believ verili calm weather held i brought away whole ship piec piec
but prepar twelfth time go board i found wind began rise howev low water i went board though i thought i rummag cabin effectu noth could found yet i discov locker drawer one i found two three razor one pair larg scissor ten dozen good knive fork anoth i
i smile sight money o drug
said i aloud art thou good
thou art worth take ground one knive worth heap i manner use thee e en remain thou art go bottom creatur whose life worth say
howev upon second thought i took away wrap piec canva i began think make anoth raft i prepar i found sky overcast wind began rise quarter hour blew fresh gale shore
it present occur vain pretend make raft wind offshor busi gone tide flood began otherwis i might abl reach shore
accord i let water swam across channel lay ship sand even difficulti enough part weight thing i part rough water wind rose hastili quit high water blew storm
but i got home littl tent i lay wealth secur
it blew hard night morn i look behold ship seen
i littl surpris recov satisfactori reflect i lost time abat dilig get everyth could use inde littl left i abl bring away i time
i gave thought ship anyth except might drive shore wreck inde diver piec afterward thing small use
my thought wholli employ secur either savag appear wild beast island i mani thought method kind dwell make whether i make cave earth tent upon earth short i resolv upon manner descript may improp give account
i soon found place i fit settlement upon low moorish ground near sea i believ would wholesom particular fresh water near i resolv find healthi conveni spot ground
i consult sever thing situat i found would proper 1st health fresh water i mention 2ndli shelter heat sun 3rdli secur raven creatur whether man beast 4thli view sea god sent ship sight i might lose advantag deliver i will banish expect yet
in search place proper i found littl plain side rise hill whose front toward littl plain steep hous side noth could come upon top
on one side rock hollow place worn littl way like entranc door cave realli cave way rock
on flat green hollow place i resolv pitch tent
this plain hundr yard broad twice long lay like green door end descend irregular everi way low ground seasid
it n n w side hill shelter heat everi day till came w s sun thereabout countri near set
befor i set tent i drew half circl hollow place took ten yard semi diamet rock twenti yard diamet begin end
in half circl i pitch two row strong stake drive ground till stood firm like pile biggest end ground five feet half sharpen top
the two row stand six inch one anoth
then i took piec cabl i cut ship laid row one upon anoth within circl two row stake top place stake insid lean two feet half high like spur post fenc strong neither man beast could get
this cost great deal time labour especi cut pile wood bring place drive earth
the entranc place i made door short ladder go top ladder i i lift i complet fenc fortifi i thought world consequ slept secur night otherwis i could done though appear afterward need caution enemi i apprehend danger
into fenc fortress infinit labour i carri rich provis ammunit store account i made larg tent preserv rain one part year violent i made doubl one smaller tent within one larger tent cover uppermost larg tarpaulin i save among sail
and i lay bed i brought shore hammock inde good one belong mate ship
into tent i brought provis everyth would spoil wet thus enclos good i made entranc till i left open pass repass i said short ladder
when i done i began work way rock bring earth stone i dug tent i laid within fenc natur terrac rais ground within foot half thus i made cave behind tent serv like cellar hous
it cost much labour mani day thing brought perfect therefor i must go back thing took thought
at time happen i laid scheme set tent make cave storm rain fall thick dark cloud sudden flash lightn happen great clap thunder natur effect
i much surpris lightn i thought dart mind swift lightn oh powder
my heart sank within i thought one blast powder might destroy defenc provid food i thought entir depend
i noth near anxious danger though powder took fire i never known hurt
such impress make upon storm i laid asid work build fortifi appli make bag box separ powder keep littl littl parcel hope whatev might come might take fire keep apart possibl make one part fire anoth
i finish work fortnight i think powder two hundr forti pound weight divid less hundr parcel
as barrel wet i apprehend danger i place new cave fanci i call kitchen rest i hid hole among rock wet might come mark care i laid
in interv time i went least everi day gun well divert see i could kill anyth fit food near i could acquaint island produc
the first time i went i present discov goat island great satisfact attend misfortun viz
shi subtl swift foot difficult thing world come i discourag doubt i might shoot one soon happen i found haunt littl i laid wait manner i observ saw valley though upon rock would run away terribl fright feed valley i upon rock took notic whenc i conclud
the first shot i made among creatur i kill goat littl kid gave suck griev heartili old one fell kid stood stock still till i came took i carri old one upon shoulder kid follow quit enclosur upon i laid dam took kid arm carri pale hope bred tame would eat i
these two suppli flesh great i ate spare save provis bread especi much possibl i could
have fix habit i found absolut necessari provid place make fire fuel burn i also i enlarg cave conveni i made i shall give full account place i must give littl account thought live may well suppos
i dismal prospect condit i cast away upon island without driven said violent storm quit cours intend voyag great way viz
hundr leagu ordinari cours trade mankind i great reason consid determin heaven desol place desol manner i end life
the tear would run plenti face i made reflect sometim i would expostul provid thus complet ruin his creatur render absolut miser without help abandon entir depress could hard ration thank life
but someth alway return swift upon check thought reprov particular one day walk gun hand seasid i pensiv upon subject present condit reason expostul way thus well desol condit true pray rememb rest
did come eleven boat
where ten
whi save lost
whi singl
is better
and i point sea
all evil consid good wors attend
then occur well i furnish subsist would case happen hundr thousand one ship float place first struck driven near shore i time get thing would case i forc live condit i first came shore without necessari life necessari suppli procur
particular said i aloud though i done without gun without ammunit without tool make anyth work without cloth bed tent manner cover
i suffici quantiti fair way provid manner live without gun ammunit spent i toler view subsist without want long i live i consid begin i would provid accid might happen time come even ammunit spent even health strength decay
i confess i entertain notion ammunit destroy one blast i mean powder blown lightn made thought surpris lighten thunder i observ
and enter melancholi relat scene silent life perhap never heard world i shall take begin continu order
it account 30th septemb manner said i first set foot upon horrid island sun us autumn equinox almost head i reckon observ latitud nine degre twenti two minut north line
after i ten twelv day came thought i lose reckon time want book pen ink even forget sabbath day prevent i cut knife upon larg post capit letter make great cross i set shore i first land i came shore 30th septemb 1659
upon side squar post i cut everi day notch knife everi seventh notch long rest everi first day month long long one thus i kept calendar week month year reckon time
in next place observ among mani thing i brought ship sever voyag mention i made i got sever thing less valu less use i omit set particular pen ink paper sever parcel captain mate gunner carpent keep three four compass mathemat instrument dial perspect
and i must forget ship dog two cat whose emin histori i may occas say someth place i carri cat dog jump ship swam shore day i went shore first cargo trusti servant mani year i want noth could fetch compani could make i want talk would
as i observ i found pen ink paper i husband utmost i shall show ink last i kept thing exact gone i could i could make ink mean i could devis
and put mind i want mani thing notwithstand i amass togeth ink one also spade pickax shovel dig remov earth needl pin thread linen i soon learn want without much difficulti
this want tool made everi work i go heavili near whole year i entir finish littl pale surround habit
the pile stake heavi i could well lift long time cut prepar wood far bring home i spent sometim two day cut bring home one post third day drive ground purpos i got heavi piec wood first last bethought one iron crow howev though i found made drive post pile
but need i concern tedious anyth i see i time enough
i employ least i could forese except rang island seek food i less everi day
i began consid serious condit circumst i reduc i drew state affair write much leav come i like heir deliv thought daili pore afflict mind reason began master despond i began comfort well i could set good evil i might someth distinguish case wors i state

recoveri
i singl separ but i singl world ship crew spare miser
death he miracul save death deliv condit
i divid mankind but i starv solitair one banish perish barren place human societi
afford susten
i cloth cover
but i hot climat i cloth i could hard wear
i without defenc but i cast island mean resist violenc i see wild beast hurt man beast
i saw coast africa i shipwreck
i soul speak but god wonder sent ship reliev
near enough shore i got mani necessari thing either suppli want enabl suppli even long i live
upon whole undoubt testimoni scarc condit world miser someth negat someth posit thank let stand direct experi miser condit world may alway find someth comfort set descript good evil credit side account
have brought mind littl relish condit given look sea see i could spi ship i say give thing i began appli arrang way live make thing easi i could
i alreadi describ habit tent side rock surround strong pale post cabl i might rather call wall i rais kind wall turf two feet thick outsid time i think year half i rais rafter lean rock thatch cover bough tree thing i could get keep rain i found time year
i alreadi observ i brought good pale cave i made behind
but i must observ first confus heap good lay order took place i room turn i set enlarg cave work farther earth loos sandi rock yield easili labour i bestow i found i pretti safe beast prey i work sideway right hand rock turn right work quit made door come
this gave egress regress back way tent storehous gave room store good
and i began appli make necessari thing i found i want particular chair tabl without i abl enjoy comfort i world i could write eat sever thing much pleasur without tabl i went work
and i must need observ reason substanc origin mathemat state squar everyth reason make ration judgment thing everi man may time master everi mechan art
i never handl tool life yet time labour applic contriv i found last i want noth i could made especi i tool
howev i made abund thing even without tool tool adz hatchet perhap never made way infinit labour
for exampl i want board i way cut tree set edg hew flat either side axe till i brought thin plank dub smooth adz
it true method i could make one board whole tree i remedi patienc i prodigi deal time labour took make plank board time labour littl worth well employ one way anoth
howev i made tabl chair i observ first place i short piec board i brought raft ship
but i wrought board i made larg shelv breadth foot half one anoth along one side cave lay tool nail ironwork word separ everyth larg place i might come easili
i knock piec wall rock hang gun thing would hang cave seen look like general magazin necessari thing everyth readi hand great pleasur see good order especi find stock necessari great
and i began keep journal everi day employ inde first i much hurri hurri labour much discomposur mind journal would full mani dull thing exampl i must said thus 30 th
after i got shore escap drown instead thank god deliver first vomit great quantiti salt water got stomach recov littl i ran shore wring hand beat head face exclaim miseri cri i undon undon
till tire faint i forc lie ground repos durst sleep fear devour
some day i board ship got i could yet i could forbear get top littl mountain look sea hope see ship fanci vast distanc i spi sail pleas hope look steadili till i almost blind lose quit sit weep like child thus increas miseri folli
but gotten thing measur settl household staff habit made tabl chair handsom i could i began keep journal i shall give copi though told particular long last ink i forc leav
chapter v build a hous the journal septemb 30 1659
i poor miser robinson cruso shipwreck dread storm of came shore dismal unfortun island i call the island despair rest ship compani drown almost dead
all rest day i spent afflict dismal circumst i brought viz
i neither food hous cloth weapon place fli despair relief saw noth death either i devour wild beast murder savag starv death want food
at approach night i slept tree fear wild creatur slept sound though rain night
octob 1
in morn i saw great surpris ship float high tide driven shore much nearer island comfort one hand see set upright broken piec i hope wind abat i might get board get food necessari relief hand renew grief loss comrad i imagin stay board might save ship
i spent great part day perplex thing length see ship almost dri i went upon sand near i could swam board
this day also continu rain though wind
from 1st octob 24th
all day entir spent mani sever voyag get i could ship i brought shore everi tide flood upon raft
much rain also day though interv fair weather seem raini season
i overset raft good i got upon shoal water thing chiefli heavi i recov mani tide
it rain night day gust wind time ship broke piec wind blow littl harder seen except wreck low water
i spent day cover secur good i save rain might spoil
i walk shore almost day find place fix habit great concern secur attack night either wild beast men
toward night i fix upon proper place rock mark semicircl encamp i resolv strengthen work wall fortif made doubl pile line within cabl without turf
from 26th 30th i work hard carri good new habit though part time rain exceed hard
the 31st morn i went island gun seek food discov countri i kill goat kid follow home i afterward kill also would feed
novemb 1
i set tent rock lay first night make larg i could stake driven swing hammock upon
i set chest board piec timber made raft form fenc round littl within place i mark fortif
i went gun kill two fowl like duck good food
in afternoon went work make tabl
this morn i began order time work go gun time sleep time divers viz
everi morn i walk gun two three hour rain employ work till eleven clock eat i live twelv two i lay sleep weather excess hot even work
the work part day next wholli employ make tabl i yet sorri workman though time necess made complet natur mechan soon i believ would one els
this day went abroad gun dog kill wild cat skin pretti soft flesh good noth everi creatur i kill i took skin preserv
come back sea shore i saw mani sort sea fowl i understand surpris almost frighten two three seal i gaze well know got sea escap time
after morn walk i went work tabl finish though like long i learn mend
now began settl fair weather
the 7th 8th 9th 10th part 12th 11th sunday i took wholli make chair much ado brought toler shape never pleas even make i pull piec sever time
i soon neglect keep sunday omit mark post i forgot
this day rain refresh exceed cool earth accompani terribl thunder lightn frighten dread fear powder
as soon i resolv separ stock powder mani littl parcel possibl might danger
14 15 16
these three day i spent make littl squar chest box might hold pound two pound powder put powder i stow place secur remot one anoth possibl
on one three day i kill larg bird good eat i knew call
this day i began dig behind tent rock make room conveni
three thing i want exceed work viz
pickax shovel wheelbarrow basket i desist work began consid suppli want make tool
as pickax i made use iron crow proper enough though heavi next thing shovel spade absolut necessari inde i could noth effectu without kind one make i knew
the next day search wood i found tree wood like brazil call iron tree exceed hard
of great labour almost spoil axe i cut piec brought home difficulti enough exceed heavi
the excess hard wood way made long upon machin i work effectu littl littl form shovel spade handl exact shape like england board part iron shod upon bottom would last long howev serv well enough use i occas put never shovel i believ made fashion long make
i still defici i want basket wheelbarrow
a basket i could make mean thing twig would bend make wicker ware least none yet found wheelbarrow i fanci i could make wheel i notion neither i know go besid i possibl way make iron gudgeon spindl axi wheel run i gave carri away earth i dug cave i made
this difficult make shovel yet shovel attempt i made vain make wheelbarrow took less four day i mean alway except morn walk gun i seldom fail seldom fail also bring home someth fit eat
my work stood still make tool finish i went work everi day strength time allow i spent eighteen day entir widen deepen cave might hold good commodi
dure time i work make room cave spacious enough accommod warehous magazin kitchen dine room cellar
as lodg i kept tent except sometim wet season year rain hard i could keep dri caus afterward cover place within pale long pole form rafter lean rock load flag larg leav tree like thatch
decemb 10
i began think cave vault finish sudden seem i made larg great quantiti earth fell top one side much short fright without reason i i never want gravedigg
i great deal work i loos earth carri import i ceil prop i might sure would come
this day i went work accord got two shore post pitch upright top two piec board across post i finish next day set post board week i roof secur post stand row serv partit part hous
from day 20th i place shelv knock nail post hang everyth could hung i began order within door
now i carri everyth cave began furnish hous set piec board like dresser order victual upon board began scarc also i made anoth tabl

no stir
rain day
no rain earth much cooler pleasant

n b i took care live leg grew well strong ever nurs long grew tame fed upon littl green door would go away
this first time i entertain thought breed tame creatur i might food powder shot spent
28 29 30 31
