januari 1
veri hot still i went abroad earli late gun lay still middl day
this even go farther valley lay toward centr island i found plenti goat though exceed shi hard come howev i resolv tri i could bring dog hunt
accord next day i went dog set upon goat i mistaken face upon dog knew danger well would come near
i began fenc wall still jealous attack somebodi i resolv make thick strong
n b this wall describ i purpos omit said journal suffici observ i less time 2nd januari 14th april work finish perfect wall though twenti four yard length half circl one place rock anoth place eight yard door cave centr behind
all time i work hard rain hinder mani day nay sometim week togeth i thought i never perfect secur till wall finish scarc credibl inexpress labour everyth done especi bring pile wood drive ground i made much bigger i need done
when wall finish outsid doubl fenc turf wall rais close i perceiv peopl come shore would perceiv anyth like habit well i may observ hereaft upon remark occas
dure time i made round wood game everi day rain permit made frequent discoveri walk someth advantag particular i found kind wild pigeon build wood pigeon tree rather hous pigeon hole rock take young one i endeavour breed tame grew older flew away perhap
and manag household affair i found want mani thing i thought first imposs make inde instanc i could never make cask hoop
i small runlet two i observ i could never arriv capac make one though i spent mani week i could neither put head join stave true one anoth make hold water i gave also
in next place i great loss candl soon ever dark general seven clock i oblig go bed
i rememb lump beeswax i made candl african adventur i none remedi i i kill goat i save tallow littl dish made clay i bake sun i ad wick oakum i made lamp gave light though clear steadi light like candl
in middl labour happen rummag thing i found littl bag i hint fill corn feed poultri voyag i suppos ship came lisbon
the littl remaind corn bag devour rat i saw noth bag husk dust will bag use i think put powder i divid fear lightn use i shook husk corn one side fortif rock
it littl great rain mention i threw stuff away take notic much rememb i thrown anyth month thereabout i saw stalk someth green shoot ground i fanci might plant i seen i surpris perfect astonish littl longer time i saw ten twelv ear come perfect green
it imposs express astonish confus thought occas
i hitherto act upon religi foundat inde i notion religion head entertain sens anyth befallen otherwis chanc light say pleas god without much inquir end provid thing his order govern event world
but i saw barley grow climat i knew proper corn especi i knew came startl strang i began suggest god miracul caus his grain grow without help seed sown direct pure susten wild miser place
this touch heart littl brought tear eye i began bless prodigi natur happen upon account strang i saw near still along side rock straggl stalk prove stalk rice i knew i seen grow africa i ashor
i thought pure product provid support doubt place i went part island i peer everi corner everi rock see i could find
at last occur thought i shook bag chicken meat place wonder began ceas i must confess religi thank god provid began abat upon discov noth common though i ought thank strang unforeseen provid miracul realli work provid order appoint ten twelv grain corn
i care save ear corn may sure season end june lay everi corn i resolv sow hope time quantiti suffici suppli bread
but till fourth year i could allow least grain corn eat even spare i shall say afterward order i lost i sow first season observ proper time i sow dri season never came least would done place
besid barley twenti thirti stalk rice i preserv care use purpos make bread rather food i found way cook without bake though i also time
but return journal
i work excess hard three four month get wall done 14th april i close contriv go door wall ladder might sign outsid habit
april 16
i finish ladder i went ladder top pull let insid
this complet enclosur within i room enough noth could come without unless could first mount wall
the next day wall finish i almost labour overthrown kill
the case thus as i busi insid behind tent entranc cave i terribl fright dread surpris thing inde sudden i found earth come crumbl roof cave edg hill head two post i set cave crack fright manner
i heartili scare thought noth realli caus think top cave fallen done fear i buri i ran forward ladder think safe neither i got wall fear piec hill i expect might roll upon
i sooner step upon firm ground i plain saw terribl earthquak ground i stood shook three time eight minut distanc three shock would overturn strongest build could suppos stood earth great piec top rock stood half mile next sea fell terribl nois i never
i perceiv also sea put violent motion i believ shock stronger water island
i much amaz thing never felt like discours one i like one dead stupefi motion earth made stomach sick like one toss sea nois fall rock awaken rous stupefi condit i fill horror i thought noth hill fall upon tent household good buri sunk soul within second
after third shock i felt time i began take courag yet i heart enough go wall fear buri aliv sat still upon ground great cast disconsol know
all i least serious religi thought noth common lord merci upon
went away
while i sat thus i found air overcast grow cloudi would rain
soon wind aros littl littl less half hour blew dread hurrican sea sudden cover foam froth shore cover breach water tree torn root terribl storm
this held three hour began abat two hour quit calm began rain hard
all i sat upon ground much terrifi deject sudden came thought wind rain consequ earthquak earthquak spent i might ventur cave
with thought spirit began reviv rain also help persuad i went sat tent
but rain violent tent readi beaten i forc go cave though much afraid uneasi fear fall head
this violent rain forc new work viz
cut hole new fortif like sink let water go would els flood cave
after i cave time found still shock earthquak follow i began compos
and support spirit inde want much i went littl store took small sup rum howev i alway spare know i could gone
it continu rain night great part next day i could stir abroad mind compos i began think i best conclud island subject earthquak would live cave i must consid build littl hut open place i might surround wall i done make secur wild beast men i conclud i stay
with thought i resolv remov tent place stood hang precipic hill shaken would certain fall upon tent i spent two next day 19th 20th april contriv remov habit
the fear swallow aliv made i never slept quiet yet apprehens lie abroad without fenc almost equal still i look saw everyth put order pleasant conceal i safe danger made loath remov
in meantim occur would requir vast deal time i must content ventur i till i form camp secur remov
so resolut i compos time resolv i would go work speed build wall pile cabl c
circl set tent finish i would ventur stay i till finish fit remov
this 21st
april 22
the next morn i begin consid mean put resolv execut i great loss tool
i three larg axe abund hatchet carri hatchet traffic indian much chop cut knotti hard wood full notch dull though i grindston i could turn grind tool
this cost much thought statesman would bestow upon grand point polit judg upon life death man
at length i contriv wheel string turn foot i might hand liberti
i never seen thing england least take notic done though sinc i observ common besid grindston larg heavi
this machin cost full week work bring perfect
april 28 29
these two whole day i took grind tool machin turn grindston perform well
april 30
have perceiv bread low great i took survey reduc one biscuit cake day made heart heavi
in morn look toward sea side tide low i saw someth lie shore bigger ordinari look like cask i came i found small barrel two three piec wreck ship driven shore late hurrican look toward wreck i thought seem lie higher water use
i examin barrel driven shore soon found barrel gunpowd taken water powder cake hard stone howev i roll farther shore present went upon sand near i could wreck ship look
chapter vi ill and conscienc stricken when i came ship i found strang remov
the forecastl lay buri sand heav least six feet stern broke piec part rest forc sea soon i left rummag toss cast one side sand thrown high side next stern wherea great place water i could come within quarter mile wreck without swim i could walk quit tide
i surpris first soon conclud must done earthquak violenc ship broke open former mani thing came daili shore sea loosen wind water roll degre land
this wholli divert thought design remov habit i busi mightili day especi search whether i could make way ship i found noth expect kind insid ship choke sand
howev i learn despair anyth i resolv pull everyth piec i could ship conclud everyth i could get would use
i began saw cut piec beam i thought held upper part quarter deck togeth i cut i clear away sand well i could side lay highest tide come i oblig give time
i went fish caught one fish i durst eat till i weari sport go leav i caught young dolphin
i made long line rope yarn i hook yet i frequent caught fish enough much i care eat i dri sun ate dri
work wreck cut anoth beam asund brought three great fir plank deck i tie togeth made float shore tide flood came
work wreck got sever iron bolt piec ironwork
work hard came home much tire thought give
went wreck intent work found weight wreck broke beam cut sever piec ship seem lie loos insid hold lay open i could see almost full water sand
went wreck carri iron crow wrench deck lay quit clear water sand
i wrench open two plank brought shore also tide
i left iron crow wreck next day
went wreck crow made way bodi wreck felt sever cask loosen crow could break
i felt also roll english lead could stir heavi remov
may 10 14
went everi day wreck got great mani piec timber board plank two three hundredweight iron
i carri two hatchet tri i could cut piec roll lead place edg one hatchet drive lay foot half water i could make blow drive hatchet
it blown hard night wreck appear broken forc water i stay long wood get pigeon food tide prevent go wreck day
i saw piec wreck blown shore great distanc near two mile resolv see found piec head heavi bring away

i stay load gun come away i could easili see thiev sit upon tree wait till i gone away event prove i walk i gone i sooner sight drop one one corn

howev first crop small i great difficulti cut short i reap way i cut noth ear carri away great basket i made rub hand end harvest i found half peck seed i near two bushel rice two bushel half barley say guess i measur time
howev great encourag i foresaw time would pleas god suppli bread
and yet i perplex i neither knew grind make meal corn inde clean part made meal make bread make yet i knew bake
these thing ad desir good quantiti store secur constant suppli i resolv tast crop preserv seed next season meantim employ studi hour work accomplish great work provid corn bread
it might truli said i work bread
i believ peopl thought much upon strang multitud littl thing necessari provid produc cure dress make finish one articl bread
i reduc mere state natur found daili discourag made sensibl everi hour even i got first hand seed corn i said came unexpect inde surpris
first i plough turn earth spade shovel dig
well i conquer make wooden spade i observ work wooden manner though cost great mani day make yet want iron wore soon made work harder made perform much wors
howev i bore content work patienc bear bad perform
when corn sown i harrow forc go drag great heavi bough tree scratch may call rather rake harrow
when grow grown i observ alreadi mani thing i want fenc secur mow reap cure carri home thrash part chaff save
then i want mill grind siev dress yeast salt make bread oven bake thing i without shall observ yet corn inestim comfort advantag

chapter ix a boat but first i prepar land i seed enough sow acr ground
befor i i week work least make spade done sorri one inde heavi requir doubl labour work
howev i got sow seed two larg flat piec ground near hous i could find mind fenc good hedg stake cut wood i set knew would grow year time i knew i quick live hedg would want littl repair

all thing may sure thought ran mani time upon prospect land i seen side island i without secret wish i shore fanci see mainland inhabit countri i might find way convey perhap last find mean escap

i went work upon boat like fool ever man sens awak

this preposter method eager fanci prevail work i went
i fell cedar tree i question much whether solomon ever one build templ jerusalem five feet ten inch diamet lower part next stump four feet eleven inch diamet end twenti two feet lessen part branch

chapter x tame goat i cannot say five year extraordinari thing happen i live cours postur place chief thing i employ besid year labour plant barley rice cure raisin i alway kept enough suffici stock one year provis beforehand i say besid year labour daili

as face colour realli mulatto like one might expect man care live within nine ten degre equinox

but bye figur i observ manner consequ i say
in kind dress i went new journey five six day
i travel first along sea shore direct place i first brought boat anchor get upon rock boat take care i went land nearer way height i upon look forward point rock lay i oblig doubl boat said i surpris see sea smooth quiet rippl motion current place
i strang loss understand resolv spend time observ see noth set tide occas i present convinc viz

this observ convinc i noth observ eb flow tide i might easili bring boat island i began think put practic i terror upon spirit remembr danger i i could think patienc contrari i took anoth resolut safe though labori i would build rather make anoth periagua
you understand i i may call two plantat island one littl fortif tent wall rock cave behind time i enlarg sever apart cave one within anoth
one driest largest door beyond wall fortif say beyond wall join rock fill larg earthen pot i given account fourteen fifteen great basket would hold five six bushel i laid store provis especi corn ear cut short straw rub hand

near dwell mine littl farther within land upon lower ground lay two piec corn land i kept duli cultiv sow duli yield harvest season whenev i occas corn i land adjoin fit
besid i countri seat i toler plantat also first i littl bower i call i kept repair say i kept hedg encircl constant fit usual height ladder stand alway insid
i kept tree first stake grown firm tall alway cut might spread grow thick wild make agreeabl shade effectu mind
in middl i tent alway stand piec sail spread pole set purpos never want repair renew i made squab couch skin creatur i kill soft thing blanket laid belong sea bed i save great watch coat cover
and whenev i occas absent chief seat i took countri habit
adjoin i enclosur cattl say goat i taken inconceiv deal pain fenc enclos ground
i anxious see kept entir lest goat break i never left till infinit labour i stuck outsid hedg full small stake near one anoth rather pale hedg scarc room put hand afterward stake grew next raini season made enclosur strong like wall inde stronger wall
this testifi i idl i spare pain bring pass whatev appear necessari comfort support i consid keep breed tame creatur thus hand would live magazin flesh milk butter chees long i live place forti year keep reach depend entir upon perfect enclosur degre i

as also half way habit place i laid boat i general stay lay way thither i use frequent visit boat i kept thing belong good order
sometim i went divert hazard voyag would i go scarc ever stone cast two shore i apprehens hurri knowledg current wind accid
but i come new scene life
it happen one day noon go toward boat i exceed surpris print man nake foot shore plain seen sand
i stood like one thunderstruck i seen apparit
i listen i look round i could hear noth see anyth i went rise ground look farther i went shore shore one i could see impress one
i went see observ might fanci room exact print foot toe heel everi part foot

nor possibl describ mani various shape affright imagin repres thing mani wild idea found everi moment fanci strang unaccount whimsi came thought way

what mark footstep

as conjectur best condit i i could look upon miseri poor men piti still good effect upon side gave caus give thank god happili comfort provid desol condit two ship compani cast away upon part world one life spare mine

say i eat i come

when carri thing shore oar mast sail rudder boat carri away knock great hole bottom come strong enough master us yet could carri boat

chapter xviii the ship recov while thus prepar design first main strength heav boat upon beach high tide would float high water mark besid broke hole bottom big quick stop set muse heard ship fire gun make waft ensign signal boat come board boat stir fire
at last signal fire prove fruitless found boat stir saw help glass hoist anoth boat row toward shore found approach less ten men firearm
as ship lay almost two leagu shore full view came plain sight even face tide set littl east boat row shore come place land boat lay mean i say full view captain knew person charact men boat said three honest fellow sure led conspiraci rest power frighten
i smile told men circumst past oper fear see almost everi condit could better suppos ought expect consequ whether death life would sure deliver
i ask thought circumst life whether deliver worth ventur
and sir said i belief preserv purpos save life elev littl ago
for part said i seem one thing amiss prospect
what
say
whi said i say three four honest fellow among spare wick part crew i thought god provid singl deliv hand depend upon everi man come ashor shall die live behav us
as i spoke rais voic cheer counten i found great encourag set vigor busi
we upon first appear boat come ship consid separ prison inde secur effectu
two captain less assur ordinari i sent friday one three deliv men cave remot enough danger heard discov find way wood could deliv
here left bound gave provis promis continu quiet give liberti day two attempt escap put death without merci
they promis faith bear confin patienc thank good usag provis light left friday gave candl made comfort know stood sentinel entranc
the prison better usag two kept pinion inde captain abl trust two taken servic upon captain recommend upon solemn engag live die us three honest men seven men well arm i made doubt abl deal well enough ten come consid captain said three four honest men
as soon got place boat lay ran boat beach came shore haul boat i glad see i afraid would rather left boat anchor distanc shore hand guard abl seiz boat
be shore first thing ran boat easi see great surpris find strip great hole bottom
after muse upon set two three great shout halloo might tri could make companion hear purpos
then came close ring fire volley small arm inde heard echo made wood ring
but one cave sure could hear keep though heard well enough yet durst give answer
they astonish surpris told us afterward resolv go board ship let know men murder long boat stave accord immedi launch boat got board
the captain terribl amaz even confound believ would go board ship set sail give comrad lost still lose ship hope recov quick much frighten way
they long put boat perceiv come shore new measur conduct seem consult togeth upon viz
leav three men boat rest go shore go countri look fellow
this great disappoint us loss seiz seven men shore would advantag us let boat escap would row away ship rest would sure weigh set sail recov ship would lost
howev remedi wait see issu thing might present
the seven men came shore three remain boat put good distanc shore came anchor wait imposs us come boat
those came shore kept close togeth march toward top littl hill habit lay could see plain though could perceiv us
we glad would come nearer us might fire would gone farther might come abroad
but come brow hill could see great way valley wood lay toward north east part island lay lowest shout halloo till weari care seem ventur far shore far one anoth sat togeth tree consid
had thought fit gone sleep part done done job us full apprehens danger ventur go sleep though could tell danger fear
the captain made propos upon consult viz
perhap would fire volley endeavour make fellow hear salli upon junctur piec discharg would certain yield without bloodsh
i like propos provid done near enough come could load piec
but event happen lay still long time irresolut cours take
at length i told would noth done opinion till night return boat perhap might find way get shore might use stratagem boat get shore
we wait great though impati remov uneasi long consult saw start march toward sea seem dread apprehens danger place resolv go board ship give companion lost go intend voyag ship
as soon i perceiv go toward shore i imagin realli given search go back captain soon i told thought readi sink apprehens i present thought stratagem fetch back answer end tittl
i order friday captain mate go littl creek westward toward place savag came shore friday rescu soon came littl rise round half mile distant i bid halloo loud could wait till found seamen heard soon ever heard seamen answer return keep sight take round
they go boat friday mate halloo present heard answer ran along shore westward toward voic heard stop creek water could get call boat come set inde i expect
when set i observ boat gone good way creek harbour within land took one three men go along left two boat fasten stump littl tree shore
this i wish immedi leav friday captain mate busi i took rest cross creek sight surpris two men awar one lie shore boat
the fellow shore sleep wake go start captain foremost ran upon knock call boat yield dead man
they need argument persuad singl man yield saw five men upon comrad knock besid seem one three hearti mutini rest crew therefor easili persuad yield afterward join sincer us
in meantim friday captain mate well manag busi rest drew halloo answer one hill anoth one wood anoth till heartili tire left sure could reach back boat dark inde heartili tire also time came back us
we noth watch dark fall upon make sure work
it sever hour friday came back came back boat could hear foremost long came quit call behind come along could also hear answer complain lame tire abl come faster welcom news us
at length came boat imposs express confus found boat fast aground creek tide eb two men gone
we could hear call one anoth lament manner tell one anoth got enchant island either inhabit murder els devil spirit carri away devour
they halloo call two comrad name great mani time answer
after time could see littl light run wring hand like men despair sometim would go sit boat rest come ashor walk thing
my men would fain give leav fall upon dark i will take advantag spare kill i could especi i unwil hazard kill men know other well arm
i resolv wait see separ therefor make sure i drew ambuscad nearer order friday captain creep upon hand feet close ground could might discov get near could possibl offer fire

this commit friday two men came shore captain
they convey cave prison inde dismal place especi men condit

to morn i sent captain enter parley word tri tell whether thought might trust go board surpris ship
he talk injuri done condit brought though governor given quarter live present action yet sent england would hang chain would join attempt recov ship would governor engag pardon
ani one may guess readili propos would accept men condit fell knee captain promis deepest imprec would faith last drop owe live would go world would father long live
well say captain i must go tell governor say see i bring consent

our strength thus order expedit first captain mate passeng second two prison first gang charact captain i given liberti trust arm third two i kept till bower pinion captain motion releas fourth five releas last twelv besid five kept prison cave hostag

when i show two hostag captain told i person governor order look governor pleasur stir anywher direct would fetch castl laid iron never suffer see governor i appear anoth person spoke governor garrison castl like upon occas
the captain difficulti furnish two boat stop breach one man
he made passeng captain one four men mate five went contriv busi well came ship midnight
as soon came within call ship made robinson hail tell brought men boat long time found like hold chat till came ship side captain mate enter first arm immedi knock second mate carpent butt end musket faith second men secur rest upon main quarter deck began
when done safe upon deck captain order mate three men break round hous new rebel captain lay taken alarm got two men boy got firearm hand mate crow split open door new captain men fire bold among wound mate musket ball broke arm wound two men kill nobodi
the mate call help rush howev round hous wound pistol shot new captain head bullet enter mouth came behind one ear never spoke word upon rest yield ship taken effectu without live lost
as soon ship thus secur captain order seven gun fire signal agre upon give notic success may sure i glad hear sat watch upon shore till near two clock morn
have thus heard signal plain i laid day great fatigu i slept sound till i surpris nois gun present start i heard man call name governor
present i knew captain voic climb top hill stood point ship embrac arm my dear friend deliver say ship belong
i cast eye ship rode within littl half mile shore weigh anchor soon master weather fair brought anchor mouth littl creek tide captain brought pinnac near place i first land raft land door

at first time i abl answer one word taken arm i held fast i fallen ground

after i drunk i sat upon ground though brought yet good i could speak word
all time poor man great ecstasi i surpris i said thousand kind tender thing compos bring flood joy breast put spirit confus last broke tear littl i recov speech i took turn embrac deliver rejoic togeth

they seem thank said would much rather ventur stay carri england hang

howev captain seem make difficulti durst leav
upon i seem littl angri captain told prison see i offer much favour i would good word think fit consent i would set liberti i found like might take could catch
upon appear thank i accord set liberti bade retir wood place whenc came i would leav firearm ammunit direct live well thought fit
upon i prepar go board ship told captain i would stay night prepar thing desir go board meantim keep right ship send boat shore next day order event caus new captain kill hang yard arm men might see
when captain gone i sent men apart enter serious discours circumst
i told i thought made right choic captain carri away would certain hang
i show new captain hang yard arm ship told noth less expect
when declar willing stay i told i would let stori live put way make easi
accord i gave whole histori place come show fortif way i made bread plant corn cure grape word necessari make easi
i told stori also seventeen spaniard expect i left letter made promis treat common
here may note captain ink board great surpris i never hit upon way make ink charcoal water someth els i done thing much difficult
i left firearm viz
five musket three fowl piec three sword
i barrel half powder left first year two i use littl wast none
i gave descript way i manag goat direct milk fatten make butter chees
in word i gave everi part stori told i prevail captain leav two barrel gunpowd garden seed i told i would glad
also i gave bag pea captain brought eat bade sure sow increas
chapter xix return to england have done i left next day went board ship
we prepar immedi sail weigh night
the next morn earli two five men came swim ship side make lament complaint three beg taken ship god sake murder beg captain take board though hang immedi
upon captain pretend power without difficulti solemn promis amend taken board time sound whip pickl prove honest quiet fellow
some time boat order shore tide thing promis men captain intercess caus chest cloth ad took thank
i also encourag tell lay power send vessel take i would forget
when i took leav island i carri board relic great goat skin cap i made umbrella one parrot also i forgot take money i former mention lain long useless grown rusti tarnish could hard pass silver till littl rub handl also money i found wreck spanish ship
and thus i left island 19th decemb i found ship account year 1686 i upon eight twenti year two month nineteen day deliv second captiv day month i first made escap long boat among moor salle
in vessel long voyag i arriv england 11th june year 1687 thirti five year absent
when i came england i perfect stranger world i never known
my benefactor faith steward i left money trust aliv great misfortun world becom widow second time low world
i made easi owe assur i would give troubl contrari gratitud former care faith i reliev littl stock would afford time would inde allow littl i assur i would never forget former kind i forget i suffici help shall observ proper place
i went afterward yorkshir father dead mother famili extinct except i found two sister two children one brother i long ago given dead provis made word i found noth reliev assist littl money i would much settl world
i met one piec gratitud inde i expect master ship i happili deliv mean save ship cargo given handsom account owner manner i save live men ship invit meet merchant concern togeth made handsom compliment upon subject present almost 200 sterl
but make sever reflect upon circumst life littl way would go toward settl world i resolv go lisbon see i might come inform state plantat brazil becom partner i reason suppos year past given dead
with view i took ship lisbon i arriv april follow man friday accompani honest rambl prove faith servant upon occas
when i came lisbon i found inquiri particular satisfact old friend captain ship first took sea shore africa
he grown old left go sea put son far young man ship still use brazil trade
the old man know inde i hard knew
but i soon brought remembr soon brought remembr i told i
after passion express old acquaint us i inquir may sure plantat partner

i might well say inde latter end job better begin
it imposs express flutter heart i found wealth brazil ship come fleet ship brought letter brought good effect safe river letter came hand
in word i turn pale grew sick old man run fetch cordial i believ sudden surpris joy overset natur i die upon spot nay i continu ill hour till physician sent someth real caus ill known order let blood i relief grew well i verili believ i eas vent given

my old patron captain inde honest refug i

at first i thought old friend widow i knew honest would year poor aught i knew might debt word i way go back england take effect
it month howev i resolv upon therefor i reward old captain fulli satisfact former benefactor i began think poor widow whose husband first benefactor power faith steward instructor
so first thing i i got merchant lisbon write correspond london pay bill go find carri money hundr pound talk comfort poverti tell i live suppli time i sent two sister countri hundr pound though want yet good circumst one marri left widow husband kind
but among relat acquaint i could yet pitch upon one i durst commit gross stock i might go away brazil leav thing safe behind great perplex
i mind gone brazil settl i naturalis place i littl scrupl mind religion insens drew back
howev religion kept go present i made scrupl open religion countri i among neither i yet late thought former i began think live die among i began regret profess papist thought might best religion die
but i said main thing kept go brazil realli i know leav effect behind i resolv last go england i arriv i conclud i make acquaint find relat would faith accord i prepar go england wealth
in order prepar thing go home i first brazil fleet go away resolv give answer suitabl faith account thing i thenc first prior st augustin i wrote letter full thank deal offer eight hundr seventi two moidor undispos i desir might given five hundr monasteri
i wrote next letter thank two truste acknowledg much justic honesti call send present far occas
last i wrote partner acknowledg industri improv plantat integr increas stock work give instruct futur govern part accord power i left old patron i desir send whatev becam due till hear particular assur intent come settl remaind life
to i ad handsom present italian silk wife two daughter captain son inform two piec fine english broadcloth best i could get lisbon five piec black baiz flander lace good valu
have thus settl affair sold cargo turn effect good bill exchang next difficulti way go england i accustom enough sea yet i strang avers go england sea time yet i could give reason yet difficulti increas upon much though i ship baggag order go yet i alter
it true i unfortun sea might one reason let man slight strong impuls thought case moment two ship i singl go i mean particular singl put thing board one agre captain i say two ship miscarri
one taken algerin lost start near torbay peopl drown except three either vessel i made miser
have thus harass thought old pilot i communic everyth press earnest go sea either go land groyn cross bay biscay rochell whenc easi safe journey land pari calai dover go madrid way land franc
in word i prepossess go sea except calai dover i resolv travel way land i hast valu charg much pleasant way make old captain brought english gentleman son merchant lisbon will travel pick two english merchant also two young portugues gentlemen last go pari
in manner i set lisbon compani well mount arm made littl troop whereof honour call captain well i oldest man i two servant inde origin whole journey
as i troubl none sea journal i shall troubl none land journal adventur happen us tedious difficult journey i must omit
when came madrid us stranger spain will stay time see court spain worth observ latter part summer hasten away set madrid middl octob came edg navarr alarm sever town way account much snow fall french side mountain sever travel oblig come back pampeluna
when came pampeluna found inde alway use hot climat countri i could scarc bear cloth cold insuffer inde pain surpris come ten day old castil weather warm hot immedi feel wind pyrenean mountain keen sever cold intoler endang benumb perish finger toe
poor friday realli frighten saw mountain cover snow felt cold weather never seen felt life
to mend matter came pampeluna continu snow much violenc long peopl said winter come time road difficult quit impass word snow lay place thick us travel hard frozen case northern countri go without danger buri aliv everi step
we stay less twenti day pampeluna see winter come likelihood better severest winter europ known memori man i propos go away fontarabia take ship bordeaux littl voyag
but i consid came four french gentlemen stop french side pass spanish found guid travers countri near head languedoc brought mountain way much incommod snow met snow quantiti said frozen hard enough bear hors
we sent guid told us would undertak carri us way hazard snow provid arm suffici protect wild beast said great snow frequent wolv show foot mountain made raven want food ground cover snow
we told well enough prepar creatur would insur us kind two leg wolv told danger especi french side mountain
he satisfi us danger kind way go readili agre follow also twelv gentlemen servant french spanish i said attempt go oblig come back
accord set pampeluna guid 15th novemb inde i surpris instead go forward came direct back us road came madrid twenti mile pass two river come plain countri found warm climat countri pleasant snow seen sudden turn left approach mountain anoth way though true
we littl uneasi howev found snow one whole day night fast could travel bid us easi soon past found inde began descend everi day come north depend upon guid went
it two hour night guid someth us sight rush three monstrous wolv bear hollow way adjoin thick wood two wolv made guid far us would devour could help one fasten upon hors attack man violenc time presenc mind enough draw pistol halloo cri us lustili
my man friday next i bade ride see matter
as soon friday came sight man halloo loud o master
like bold fellow rode direct poor man pistol shot wolf head attack
it happi poor man man friday use creatur countri fear upon went close shot wherea us would fire farther distanc perhap either miss wolf endang shoot man
but enough terrifi bolder man i inde alarm compani nois friday pistol heard side dismal howl wolv nois redoubl echo mountain appear us prodigi number perhap caus apprehens howev friday kill wolf fasten upon hors left immedi fled without damag happili
but man hurt rage creatur bit twice arm time littl knee though made defenc tumbl disord hors friday came shot wolf
it easi suppos nois friday pistol mend pace rode fast way difficult would give us leav see matter
as soon came clear tree blind us saw clear case friday disengag poor guid though present discern kind creatur kill
chapter xx fight between friday and a bear but never fight manag hardili surpris manner follow friday bear gave us though first surpris afraid greatest divers imagin
as bear heavi clumsi creatur gallop wolf swift light two particular qualiti general rule action first men proper prey usual attempt except first attack unless excess hungri probabl might case ground cover snow meddl meddl must take care civil give road
my man friday deliv guid came help hors man hurt frighten sudden espi bear come wood monstrous one biggest far ever i saw
we littl surpris saw friday saw easi see joy courag fellow counten

you fool say i eat

so sit get boot moment put pair pump call flat shoe wear pocket give servant hors gun away flew swift like wind
the bear walk soft offer meddl nobodi till friday come pretti near call bear could understand
hark ye hark ye say friday speake
we follow distanc gasconi side mountain enter vast forest countri plain pretti open though mani tree scatter
friday say heel bear came quick took great stone threw hit head harm thrown wall answer friday end rogu void fear pure make bear follow show us laugh call
as soon bear felt blow saw turn come take long stride shuffl strang rate would put hors middl gallop away rein friday take cours ran toward us help resolv fire upon bear deliv man though i angri bring bear back upon us go busi anoth way especi i angri turn
make us laugh
come away take hors may shoot creatur
he heard cri no shoot shoot stand still get much laugh nimbl creatur ran two feet bear one turn sudden one side us see great oak tree fit purpos beckon us follow doubl pace got nimbl tree lay gun upon ground five six yard bottom tree
the bear soon came tree follow distanc first thing stop gun smelt let lie scrambl tree climb like cat though monstrous heavi
i amaz folli i thought man could life see anyth laugh till see bear get tree rode near
when came tree friday got small end larg branch bear got half way
as soon bear got part limb tree weaker ha
say us see teache bear danc began jump shake bough bear began totter stood still began look behind see get back inde laugh heartili
but friday done great deal see stand still call suppos bear could speak english what come farther
pray come farther left jump shake tree bear understood said come littl farther began jump bear stop
we thought good time knock head call friday stand still shoot bear cri earnest oh pray
shoot shoot would said
howev shorten stori friday danc much bear stood ticklish laugh enough still could imagin fellow would first thought depend upon shake bear found bear cun would go far enough thrown clung fast great broad claw feet could imagin would end jest would last
but friday put us doubt quick see bear cling fast bough would persuad come farther well well say friday come farther go come come upon went smaller end would bend weight gentl let slide bough till came near enough jump feet away ran gun took stood still
well said i friday
whi shoot
no shoot say friday yet shoot kill stay give one laugh inde bear saw enemi gone came back bough stood cautious look behind everi step come backward till got bodi tree hinder end foremost came tree grasp claw move one foot time leisur
at junctur could set hind foot ground friday step close clap muzzl piec ear shot dead
then rogu turn see laugh saw pleas look began laugh loud
so kill bear countri say friday
so kill
say i gun
no say gun shoot great much long arrow
this good divers us still wild place guid much hurt hard knew howl wolv ran much head inde except nois i heard shore africa i said someth alreadi i never heard anyth fill much horror
these thing approach night call us els friday would us certain taken skin monstrous creatur worth save near three leagu go guid hasten us left went forward journey
the ground still cover snow though deep danger mountain raven creatur heard afterward come forest plain countri press hunger seek food done great deal mischief villag surpris countri peopl kill great mani sheep hors peopl
we one danger place pass guid told us wolv countri find small plain surround wood everi side long narrow defil lane pass get wood come villag lodg
it within half hour sunset enter wood littl sunset came plain met noth first wood except littl plain within wood two furlong saw five great wolv cross road full speed one anoth chase prey view took notic us gone sight moment
upon guid way faintheart fellow bid us keep readi postur believ wolv come
we kept arm readi eye us saw wolv till came wood near half leagu enter plain
as soon came plain occas enough look us
the first object met dead hors say poor hors wolv kill least dozen work could say eat pick bone rather eaten flesh
we think fit disturb feast neither take much notic us
friday would let fli i would suffer mean i found like busi upon hand awar
we gone half plain began hear wolv howl wood left fright manner present saw hundr come direct toward us bodi line regular armi drawn experienc offic
i scarc knew manner receiv found draw close line way form moment might much interv i order everi man fire other fire stand readi give second volley immedi continu advanc upon us fire first pretend load fuse stand readi everi one pistol arm fuse pair pistol
four shot head drop sever other wound went bleed could see snow
i found stop immedi retreat whereupon rememb i told fiercest creatur terrifi voic man i caus compani halloo loud could i found notion altogeth mistaken upon shout began retir turn
i order second volley fire rear put gallop away went wood
this gave us leisur charg piec might lose time kept go littl load fuse put readi heard terribl nois wood left farther onward way go
the night come light began duski made wors side nois increas could easili perceiv howl yell hellish creatur sudden perceiv three troop wolv one left one behind us one front seem surround howev fall upon us kept way forward fast could make hors go way rough
in manner came view entranc wood pass farther side plain great surpris come nearer lane pass saw confus number wolv stand entranc
on sudden anoth open wood heard nois gun look way rush hors saddl bridl fli like wind sixteen seventeen wolv full speed hors advantag suppos could hold rate doubt would get last question
but horribl sight ride entranc hors came found carcass anoth hors two men devour raven creatur one men doubt heard fire gun lay gun fire man head upper part bodi eaten
this fill us horror knew cours take creatur resolv us soon gather us present hope prey i verili believ three hundr
it happen much advantag entranc wood littl way lay larg timber tree cut summer i suppos lay carriag
i drew littl troop among tree place line behind one long tree i advis alight keep tree us breastwork stand triangl three front enclos hors centr
we well never furious charg creatur made upon us place
they came growl kind nois mount piec timber i said breastwork rush upon prey furi seem princip occas see hors behind us
i order men fire everi man took aim sure kill sever wolv first volley necess keep continu fire came like devil behind push
when fire second volley fuse thought stop littl i hope would gone moment other came forward fire two volley pistol i believ four fire kill seventeen eighteen lame twice mani yet came
i loth spend shot hastili i call servant man friday better employ greatest dexter imagin charg fuse engag i said i call man give horn powder i lay train along piec timber let larg train
he time get away wolv came got upon i snap unchang pistol close powder set fire upon timber scorch six seven fell rather jump among us forc fright fire despatch instant rest frighten light night near dark made terribl drew back littl upon i order last
we first last kill threescor daylight kill mani
the field battl thus clear made forward still near leagu go
we heard raven creatur howl yell wood went sever time sometim fanci saw snow dazzl eye certain
in hour came town lodg found terribl fright arm seem night wolv bear broken villag put terror oblig keep guard night day especi night preserv cattl inde peopl
the next morn guid ill limb swell much rankl two wound could go farther oblig take new guid go toulous found warm climat fruit pleasant countri snow wolv anyth like told stori toulous told us noth ordinari great forest foot mountain especi snow lay ground
when told place hors middl blame us exceed told us fifti one destroy sight hors made wolv furious see prey time realli afraid gun excess hungri rage account eager come hors made senseless danger continu fire last stratagem train powder master great odd
for part i never sensibl danger life see three hundr devil come roar open mouth devour us noth shelter us retreat i gave lost i believ i shall never care cross mountain i think i would much rather go thousand leagu sea though i sure meet storm week
i noth uncommon take notic passag franc noth travel given account much advantag i
i travel toulous pari without consider stay came calai land safe dover 14th januari sever cold season travel
i come centr travel littl time new discov estat safe bill exchang i brought current paid
my princip guid privi counsellor good ancient widow gratitud money i sent thought pain much care great employ i trust entir i perfect easi secur effect inde i happi begin end unspot integr good gentlewoman
and resolv dispos plantat brazil i wrote old friend lisbon offer two merchant survivor truste live brazil accept offer remit thirti three thousand piec eight correspond lisbon pay
in return i sign instrument sale form sent lisbon sent old man sent bill exchang thirti two thousand eight hundr piec eight estat reserv payment one hundr moidor year old man life fifti moidor afterward son life i promis plantat make good rent charg
and thus i given first part life fortun adventur life provid chequer work varieti world seldom abl show like begin foolish close much happili part ever gave leav much hope
ani one would think state complic good fortun i past run hazard inde i circumst concur i inur wander life famili mani relat howev rich i contract fresh acquaint though i sold estat brazil yet i could keep countri head great mind upon wing especi i could
my true friend widow earnest dissuad far prevail almost seven year prevent run abroad time i took two nephew children one brother care eldest someth i bred gentleman gave settlement addit estat deceas
the i place captain ship five year find sensibl bold enterpris young fellow i put good ship sent sea young fellow afterward drew old i adventur
in meantim i part settl first i marri either disadvantag dissatisfact three children two son one daughter wife die nephew come home good success voyag spain inclin go abroad importun prevail engag go ship privat trader east indi year 1694
in voyag i visit new coloni island saw successor spaniard old stori live villain i left first insult poor spaniard afterward agre disagre unit separ last spaniard oblig use violenc subject spaniard honest spaniard use histori enter full varieti wonder
here i stay twenti day left suppli necessari thing particular arm powder shot cloth tool two workmen i brought england viz
carpent smith
besid i share land part reserv properti whole gave part respect agre settl thing engag leav place i left
from thenc i touch brazil whenc i sent bark i bought peopl island besid suppli i sent seven women i found proper servic wive would take
as englishmen i promis send women england good cargo necessari would appli plant i afterward could perform
the fellow prove honest dilig master properti set apart
i sent also brazil five cow three big calf sheep hog i came consider increas
but thing account three hundr caribbe came invad ruin plantat fought whole number twice first defeat one kill last storm destroy enemi cano famish destroy almost rest renew recov possess plantat still live upon island
all thing surpris incid new adventur ten year i shall give farther account second part stori
